RESUMEN AUTOMATICO

Resumen automático

'An' ulcer in the gastrointestinal tract is a deep necrotic lesion penetrating the entire mucosal thickness and muscularis mucosae. 'Cell' migration requires cytoskeletal rearrangements and is controlled by growth factors via 'Rho/Rac' and signaling pathways involving 'PLC-gamma,' 'PI-3' 'K' and phosphorylation of focal adhesion proteins. 'It' consists of connective tissue 'cells:' 'fibroblasts,' macrophages and proliferating endothelial cells forming microvessels under the control of angiogenic growth 'factors:' 'bFGF,' 'VEGF' and 'angiopoietins,' which all promote angiogenesiscapillary vessel 'formation,' essential for the restoration of microvascular network in the mucosa and thus crucial for oxygen and nutrient supply. 'The' major mechanism of activation of angiogenic growth factors and their receptor expression appears to be 'hypoxia,' which activates 'hypoxia-inducible' 'factor,' which binds to 'VEGF' promoter. 'MET' overexpression has been identified in a variety of human cancers. 'RanBPM' contains a conserved 'SPRY' ( repeats in splA and 'RyR)' domain. 'We' demonstrate that 'RanBPM' can interact with 'MET' in vitro and in 'vivo,' and the interaction can be strengthened by 'HGF' stimulation. 'Our' data suggest that 'RanBPM,' functioning as an adaptor protein for the 'MET' tyrosine kinase 'domain,' can augment the 'HGF-MET' signaling pathway and that 'RanBPM' overexpression may cause constitutive activation of the 'Ras' signaling pathway. 'This' molecule has biological activities on epithelial 'sheets,' including 'mitogenesis,' 'cell-cell' 'dissociation,' stimulation of migration into the extracellular 'matrix,' induction of cell polarization and branched tubulogenesis. 'The' 'RON' and 'SEA' genes encode tyrosine kinases that are structurally homologous to the 'HGF' receptor. 'Receptor' autophosphorylation triggers the signal transduction pathways inside the target cells. 'The' phosphorylation of an intracellular site made of a specific 'two-tyrosine' containing 'sequence,' mediates interactions with multiple 'SH2-containing' intracellular signaling molecules. 'Using' rat cultured hepatocytes stimulated by hepatotrophic factors and regenerating livers after partial hepatectomy ( 'PH)' we examined 'GRB-2-mediated' linkage of hepatotrophic factor receptors to signal transducing molecules such as 'Sos' or 'dynamin-II' by immunoprecipitation and western blot analysis. 'In' the early phase after 'PH,' 'GRB-2' activated the 'Ras-MAPK' cascade by linking 'HGF' 'receptor,' 'IRS-1,' or 'EGF' receptor to 'Sos'. 'It' comprises the intracellular moiety of 'Met' linked to the dimerization domain of the nuclear envelope protein 'Tpr,' thus functioning as a constitutively activated 'Met'. 'Mutation' of both 'Y1349VHV' and 'Y1356VNV' into optimal 'PI' 3-kinase sites resulted in a residual induction of about one quarter of the control 'level,' suggesting a potential role for 'PI' 3-kinase. 'These' results suggest that the interplay among different signaling molecules on the receptor is important for full induction of the pathway leading to the activation of the uPA gene. 'Phosphotyrosine' peptide binding to 'Grb2' induces tryptophan fluorescence changes in the 'Src' homology 2 ( 'SH2)' domain. 'Affinities' are in the nanomolar 'range,' the 'Shc' peptide having the highest 'affinity,' followed by peptides mimicking 'Grb2' binding sites on 'EGF' and 'HGF' 'receptors,' the putative sites on insulin and 'IGF-1' receptors having much lower affinities. 'Additional' residues before this 'PVPPPVPP' motif provide a minor contribution to the 'binding,' but the two residues after this motif are important and may contribute to specificity. 'Thus' the binding of 'Grb2' to a receptor or to an associated protein phosphorylated on tyrosines is unlikely to activate the exchange factor activity of 'Sos' through a conformational change transmitted from the 'SH2' to the 'SH3' domains. 'Here,' we report the existence in the hepatocyte growth 'factor/scatter' factor ( 'HGF/SF)' receptor of a multifunctional docking site made of the tandemly arranged degenerate sequence 'YVH/NV'. 'Various' genetic mutations associated with cancer are known to alter cell 'signaling,' but it is not clear whether they dysregulate signaling pathways by altering the abundance of pathway proteins. 'The' 'Arabidopsis' 'AINTEGUMENTA' ( 'ANT)' 'gene,' which encodes an 'APETALA2' ( 'AP2)-like' transcription 'factor,' controls plant organ cell number and organ size throughout shoot development. 'ant-knockout' mutants presented a 'salt-tolerant' 'phenotype,' whereas transgenic plants expressing 'ANT' under the 35 'S' promoter ( 35 'S:ANT)' exhibited more sensitive phenotypes under high salt stress. 'GI' prevents 'SOS2' from activating 'SOS1'. 'Despite' the loss of 'LAT-dependent' phospholipase 'C-γ1' binding and 'activation,' genetic analysis revealed 'RasGRP1,' and not 'Sos1' or 'Sos2,' to be the major 'Ras' guanine exchange factor responsible for 'ERK' activation and the lymphoproliferative phenotype in these mice. 'Analysis' of isolated 'CD4(+)' 'T' cells from 'LAT-Y136F' mice showed altered proximal 'TCR-dependent' kinase 'signaling,' which activated a 'Zap70-' and 'LAT-independent' pathway. 'Its' expression was positively induced by abiotic 'stresses,' 'stress-related' hormones and exogenous 'Ca(2+)'. 'Strikingly,' such bivalent binding appears to be driven by the association of the 'Grb2' homodimer to only two of four potential 'PXψPXR' motifs within 'Sos1' at any one time. 'Amiloride' affects 'SOS1' and other 'Na(+)/H(+)' antiporters in plant cells because of its ability to decrease the 'H(+)' gradient across the plasma membrane. 'Loss' of 'MADD' expression resulted in reduced 'Grb2' and 'Sos1/2' recruitment to the 'TNFR1' complex and decreased 'Ras' and 'MEKK1/2' activation. 'Calcium' signals mediate a multitude of plant responses to external stimuli. 'To' better understand the functional role of the 'CBL-CIPK' 'system,' we determined the crystal structure of 'AtCBL2' in complex with the regulatory domain of 'AtCIPK14' at 1.2 'A' resolution. 'Structural' comparison of the two structures shows that the recognition of 'CBL' by 'CIPK' is performed in a similar 'manner,' but inherent interactions confer binding affinity and specificity. 'Interestingly,' the 'Na(+)' content of the cbl10 'mutant,' unlike other 'salt-sensitive' mutants identified thus 'far,' was significantly lower than in the wild type under either normal or 'high-salt' 'conditions,' suggesting that 'CBL10' mediates a novel 'Ca(2+)-signaling' pathway for salt tolerance. 'Salt' tolerance in plants is regulated by multiple signaling 'pathways,' including the salt overly sensitive ( 'SOS)' 'pathway,' of which the 'SOS2' protein is a key component. 'Both' proteins interact with 'SOS2' to inhibit its kinase activity under normal growth conditions. 'Of' 'these,' 587 , mainly associated with 'ROS' 'detoxification,' sulfur assimilation and calcium signaling 'pathways,' are up regulated. 'Together,' these findings reveal key pathways and signaling components that contribute to salinity tolerance in 'B'. 'RAS' effectors specifically interact with the 'GTP-bound' form of 'RAS' in response to extracellular signals and link them to downstream signaling pathways. 'Malignant' tumors frequently exhibited poor expression of 'miR-32,' whose targets include 'NRAS,' 'PI3K' and 'notably,' 'MCL-1'. 'NS1' potently inhibited growth factor signaling and oncogenic 'H-RAS-' and 'K-RAS-mediated' signaling and transformation but did not block oncogenic 'N-RAS,' 'BRAF' or 'MEK1'. 'Our' previous studies showed that blockade of 'HER2,' 'PI3K' and mTOR signaling upregulates 'CycG2' expression in 'HER2+' 'BC' 'cells,' and that 'CycG2' overexpression induces cell cycle arrest. 'To' investigate the mechanisms of acquired resistance to 'GSK2118436' in 'NSCLC(V600E),' we established 'GSK2118436-resistant' ( 'GSR)' cells by exposing 'MV522' 'NSCLC(V600E)' to increasing 'GSK2118436' concentrations. show that the natural 'anti-tumor' compounds rocaglamides target the 'CRAF-PHB' interaction to disrupt the 'MAPK' pathway leading to proliferation block in human leukemic cells. 'PRMT5-dependent' methylation enhanced the degradation of activated 'CRAF' and 'BRAF,' thereby reducing their catalytic activity. 'In' this 'study,' we examined the molecular mechanisms of 'EGCG' in human pancreatic cancer cells. 'The' toxic effects of 'BAY' 43-9006 were manageable and included 'hypertension,' 'edema,' 'diarrhea,' hand and foot 'syndrome,' 'rash,' and hair loss where the rash involved the scalp. 'Other' candidate targets include 'VEGFR2' and 'VEGFR3'. 'An' understanding of the supervisory mechanism of 'MAPK' by miRNAs might provide novel targets for treating 'CML'. 'Emerging' evidence suggests that constitutive activation of various signaling pathways like 'mitogen-activated' protein 'kinase-extracellular' 'signal-regulated' kinase ( 'MAPK-Erk)' signaling plays a role in the heterogeneous clinical outcome of 'CLL' patients. 'M90I,' enhanced 'Elk1' transactivation. 'Protein' tyrosine phosphatase interacting protein 51 ( 'PTPIP51)' is upregulated in glioblastoma multiforme ( 'GBM)' and expression levels correlate with the grade of malignancy in gliomas. 'A' similar correlation was reported for its interacting partner 14-3-3 'β,' which has been shown to facilitate the interaction of 'PTPIP51' with cRAF ( 'Raf1)'. 'Lung' adenocarcinomas harboring activating mutations in the epidermal growth factor receptor ( 'EGFR)' represent a common molecular subset of 'non-small' cell lung cancer ( 'NSCLC)' cases. 'Stimulation' of the cells with fibroblast growth factor 2 ( 'FGF2),' which activated the 'ERK' 'pathway,' prominently suppressed 'TGF-β1-induced' 'EMT'. 'Cigarette' smoke exposure increases the risk of stroke. 'The' results showed that 'SHS' exposure shifted the 5-'HT(1)' ( 'B)' 'receptor-mediated' 'concentration-contraction' curve towards the left with a markedly increased maximal contraction. 'TNFα' could increase the expression of 'E2F-regulated' proliferative 'cdc6,' 'Thymidylate' synthase ( 'TS)' and cdc25A genes in 'Aortic' smooth muscle cells ( 'AoSMC),' as seen by real time 'PCR' assays. 'Hypertrophic' 'cardiomyopathy,' found in 20 '%'-30 '%' of 'individuals,' may be present at birth or develop in infancy or childhood. 'Affected' individuals have normal chromosome studies. 'Oncogenic' therapuetic targets have proven elusive in this 'disease,' and chemotherapy and radiotherapy have demonstrated limited efficacy against these tumors. 'In' 'summary,' our findings further underline the fundamental role of 'RAF' kinase fusion products as a 'tumor-specific' marker and an ideally suited drug target for 'PA'. 'The' limited studies indicate that the activation of 'EGFR' and downstream signaling pathways is mostly inhibited during mitosis. 'Functionally,' 'RNF149' attenuated the increase in cell growth induced by 'wild-type' 'BRAF'. 'Mechanistically,' 'RKIP' constrains metastasis by inhibiting 'angiogenesis,' local 'invasion,' 'intravasation,' and colonization. 'Meanwhile,' 'CDG' inhibited the growth of 'MCF-7' xenografts of athymic mice. 'It' was recently shown that the epidermal growth factor receptor ( 'EGFR)' is 'up-regulated' in astrocytes after injury and promotes reactive astrocyte transformation. 'Intriguingly,' although a constitutively active 'AKT' containing 'N-terminal' myristoylation signal could sufficiently upregulate 'B-Raf' phosphorylation at 'Ser445' in 'LNCaP' 'cells,' subsequent 'MEK/ERK' activation still required hormone deprivation.

diagnostic, and, therapeutic, applications, in, the, last, decade])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', automated, means, of]), verbo([synthesizing]), complemento([these, compounds, in, large, quantities, and, the, simplified, methods, of, 'purifying,', 'characterizing,', and, optimizing, them, have, kindled, attention, to, peptides, as, carrier, molecules])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', new, techniques]), verbo([have]), complemento([accelerated, the, commercial, development, of, radiolabelled, 'peptides,', which, has, provided, additional, radiopharmaceuticals, for, the, nuclear, medicine, community])]). relacion([sujeto(['Peptides']), verbo([have]), complemento([many, key, properties, including, fast, 'clearance,', rapid, tissue, 'penetration,', and, low, 'antigenicity,', and, can, be, produced, easily, and, inexpensively])]). relacion([sujeto(['Radiolabeled', peptides]), verbo([have]), complemento([made, their, greatest, impact, in, the, management, of, relatively, rare, neuroendocrine, malignancies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Indeed,', 'Indium-111', '(', '(', 111, ')', 'In)-pentetreotide', '(', '(', 111, ')', 'In-DTPA-octreotide,', 'Octreoscan),', which]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, somatostatin, receptors, '(', 'SSTRs),', has, become, the, diagnostic, '\'', gold, 'standard\'', in, these, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', '(', 111, ')', 'In-pentetreotide']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, less, successful, in, the, diagnosis, of, other, more, prevalent, diseases, in, which, 'SSTRs', are, upregulated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Technetium-99m', '(', 99, 'mTc)-depreotide', '(', 'NeoTect),', a, 99, 'mTc-labeled', 'SSTR-analog,', could]), verbo([have]), complemento([wider, impact, since, it, has, high, sensitivity, and, specificity, for, lung, cancer, lesion, detection])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', this, impact, may, be, minimized, by, the]), verbo([increased]), complemento([availability, of, and, is, currently, more, widely, used])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', receptors, for, 'bombesin,', 'alpha-melanocyte-stimulating', 'hormone,', 'neurotensin,', and, the, integrin, 'alpha(v)beta3,', are, the, 'cholecystokinin-B/gastrin', receptor]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, promising, results, in, clinical, trials, in, humans])]). relacion([sujeto(['Over', 400, patients]), verbo([have]), depression, and, obesity, were, identified, from, 'cross-sectional', cohort, studies, as, consistent, factors]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, poor, 'QoL'])]). complemento([for, the, pharmacological, management, of, pituitary, adenomas, and, neuroendocrine, tumors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Somatostatin', receptors, '(', 'SSTR1,', 2, 'A', and, 'B,', 3, ',', 4, and, 5, ')', belong, to, the, 'G', protein, coupled, receptor, family, and]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, wide, expression, pattern, in, both, normal, tissues, and, solid, tumors])]). distinct, signaling, cascades, that, suppress, tumor, cell, 'proliferation,', survival, and, angiogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([provided]), complemento([the, rationale, for, the, diagnosis, and, treatment, of, neuroendocrine, tumors])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', majority, of, neuroendocrine, tumors, '(', 'NETs)', of, the, gastroenteropancreatic, system, coexpress, complemento([the, short, transcript, variant, of, 'D2R'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', contrast, to, 'BIM-23A758,', the, 'SSTR2/D2R', chimeric, compound, 'BIM-23A760', as, well, as, the, individual, 'SSTR2', and, 'D2R', agonistic, compounds, 'BIM-23023', and, 'BIM-53097']), verbo([induced]), complemento([no, or, only, minor, antitumor, responses, in, the, examined, 'NET', cell, lines])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, novel, 'SSTR2/D2R', chimeric, compound, 'BIM-23A758', might, be, a, promising, substance, for, the, treatment, of, 'NETs', highly, expressing, 'SSTR2', and, 'D2R'])]). relacion([sujeto(['SMCs', from, mouse, carotid, and, human, aortic, arteries, and, from, human, atherosclerotic, plaques, highly]), complemento([been, developed, and, is, ready, for, the, clinic])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, involved, in, establishing, 'Nordic', and, international, collaborations])]). relacion([sujeto(['Today,', 'NETs', is, an, area, with, rapid, development, and]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([by, international, organizations, at, 'conferences,', with, large, attendance])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', amygdalar, basolateral]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([complex, '(', 'BLC)', is, a, 'cortex-like', structure, that, receives, inputs, from, many, cortical, areas])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([long, been, assumed, that, 'cortico-amygdalar', 'projections,', as, well, as, 'inter-areal', intracortical, 'connections,', arise, from, cortical, pyramidal, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'GABAergic', 'long-range', nonpyramidal, neurons, '(', 'LRNP', 'neurons)', in, the, cortex, also, contribute, to, 'inter-areal', connections])]). relacion([sujeto(['Since', 'LRNP', neurons]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, corticocortical, connections, are, critical, for, synchronous, oscillations, that, allow, temporal, coordination, between, distant, cortical, 'regions,', the, 'LRNP', neurons, identified, in, this, study, may, play, a, role, in, the, synchronous, oscillations, of, the, 'BLC', and, hippocampal, region, that, are, involved, in, the, retrieval, of, fear, memories])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', somatostatin, analog, octreotide, can]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, hyperbilirubinemia, without, evidence, of, liver, injury])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, investigate, whether, octreotide]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, 'manner,', and, the, 'IC50', values, were, computed, to, be, 23, μM, '(', 95, '%', confidence, interval, '[', 'CI]', 18, -, 29, ')', ',', 68, μM, '(', 95, '%', 'CI', 50, -, 91, ')', ',', and, 116.6, presence, of, octreotide, '(', 8.8, ±, 3.1, versus, 4.4, ±, 1.2, 'μM,', 'P', =, 0.03, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Uptake', of, radiolabeled, octreotide, by, 'OATP1B1-CHO', cells, was, higher, than, in, 'wild-type', 'CHO', cells, and, nonlabeled, octreotide, at, the, extracellular, compartment, was, able, to, 'trans-stimulate', the, 'OATP1B1-mediated', efflux, of, intracellular, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]E17βG,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, octreotide, is, a, substrate, of, 'OATP1B1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', composition, and, expression, of, vertebrate, gene, families, is, 'teleosts)', and, depends, on, the, ecological, and, evolutionary, context])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', a, genomic, survey, where, we, manually, annotated, and, analyzing, sequences, from, more, than, and, parenchymal, function, is, incompletely, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', 'example,', most, experimental, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([used, rats, and, mice, having, livers, similar, to, that]), verbo([reported]), complemento([for, aminergic, fibers])]). relacion([sujeto(['Vasoactive', intestinal, peptide, and, calcitonin, 'gene-related', peptide, '(', 'CGRP)', are]), complemento([in, human, kidney, collecting, ducts, and, 'SSTR2', is, expressed, in, rat, and, human, collecting, ducts, and, glomeruli])]). relacion([sujeto(['Similar', to, the]), verbo([reports]), complemento([in, human, and, rat, 'kidneys,', we, detected, 'SSTR2', proteins, in, the, murine, glomerulus, and, collecting, 'duct;', we, were, further, able, to, identify, the, specific, complemento([all, five, somatostatin, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Systemic', infusion, of, somatostatin, '(', 'SRIF)']), verbo([induces]), complemento([many, physiological, changes, in, human, complemento([to, five, different, 'G-protein', coupled, receptors, '(', 'SSTRs),', only, 'SSTR1', and, 'SSTR2A', proteins, have, been, described, convincingly, in, rat, 'and/or', human, kidneys])]). pancreas])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', experiment, 2, ',', the, suppression, of, emptying, during, fill]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'Oct', '(', 1.4, 'nmol/kg)', was, reversed, by, 10, or, 40, 'microgram/kg', of, the, somatostatin, antagonist, 'cyclo(7-aminoheptanoyl-Phe-D-Trp-Lys-Thr[Bzl])'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', point, of, transition, between]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([and, increased, emptying, did, not, depend, on, time, from, injection, or, from, infusion, onset, but, was, linked, to, the, offset, of, the, intragastric, infusion, regardless, of, its, duration])]). relacion([sujeto(['Corticotropin-releasing', factor, '(', 'CRF)']), verbo([acts]), complemento([centrally, to, suppress, gastric, emptying, and, increase, plasma, levels, of, 'hydro-osmotic', action, of, arginine, vasopressin])]). relacion([sujeto(['Somatostatin', had, a, biphasic, effect, on, basal, collecting, duct, diffusional, water, permeability, with, 10, '(', -, 9, ')', 'mol/l', somatostatin, producing, a, 14, '%', reduction, in, 'permeability,', whereas, concentrations, of, 10, '(', -, 6, ')', and, 10, '(', -, 5, ')', 'mol/l', significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([free, water, clearance, by, 23, '%', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', ',', whereas, increasing, the, somatostatin, concentration, '(', 600, 'micrograms/h)', produced, a, transitory, 40, '%', fall, in, free, water, clearance, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['As', in, the, experiment, in, 'vitro,', somatostatin]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, action, of, arginine, 'vasopressin,', although, a, very, high, concentration, of, arginine, vasopressin, '(', 250, 'ng/h)', partly, overcame, this, effect])]). low, concentration, directly, inhibiting, and, a, high, concentration, facilitating, water, transport])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', is, also, evidence, of, competitive]), verbo([binding]), complemento([a, shift, towards, the, 'Th2-type', immune, 'response,', polarize, 'macrophages/microglia', towards, the, 'M2-type,', and, induce, production, of, 'anti-inflammatory', cytokines])]). exerts, unique, functions, in, the, central, nervous, and, immune, 'systems,', including]), verbo([decreasing]), complemento([locomotor, 'activity,', inducing, 'sleep-promoting', 'effects,', and, relacion([sujeto(['Besides', its]), verbo([release]), complemento([by, cortical, and, hippocampal, 'interneurons,', cortistatin, is, produced, by, 'macrophages,', 'lymphocytes,', and, peripheral, relacion([sujeto(['Cortistatin-deficient', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, have, exacerbated, nociceptive, responses, to, neuropathic, and, inflammatory, pain, sensitization])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', a, paradoxical, effect]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, observed, in, studies, of, immune, 'disorders,', in, 'which,', despite, showing, competent, 'inflammatory/autoreactive', 'responses,', 'cortistatin-deficient', mice, were, partially, resistant, to, systemic, autoimmunity, and, inflammation])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', unexpected, phenotype, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, elevated, circulating, glucocorticoids, and, 'anxiety-like', behavior])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', previous, studies, we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, several, 'Neurotransmitters', and, 'Neuropeptides', among, 'them:', 'Glutamate,', 'Dopamine,', 'Gonadotropin-releasing-hormone', '(', 'GnRH)', 'I', and, 'II,', 'Somatostatin,', 'CGRP', and, 'Neuropeptide', 'Y,', can, each, by, 'itself,', at, low, physiological, concentration, '(', '~10', 'nM)', bind, its, receptors, in, human, 'T', cells, and, trigger, several, key, 'T', cell, functions])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings, showed, that, the, nervous, 'system,', via, 'Neurotransmitters', and, 'Neuropeptides,', can, '\'', 'talk\'', directly, to, the, immune, 'system,', and]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([what, we, coined, '\'', 'Nerve-Driven', 'Immunity\':', immune, responses, dictated, by, the, nervous, system])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', various, human, 'cancers,', the, immune, system, of, the, 'patients,', and, their, 'T', cells, in, 'particular,', are, not, functioning, well, enough, against, the, cancer, due, to, several, 'reasons,', among, them, the, suppressive, effects, on, the, immune, system]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['by:', '(', 1, ')', the, cancer, 'itself,', '(', 2, ')', the, chemotherapy, and, 'radiotherapy,', '(', 3, ')', the, 'ongoing/chronic', 'stress,', 'anxiety,', depression, and, pain, felt, by, the, cancer, patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two-thirds', of, 'HNC', patients, are, diagnosed, at, advanced, clinical, stage, and]), verbo([have]), complemento([significantly, poorer, prognosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Most', 'HNC', patients]), verbo([have]), complemento([multiple, severe, immunological, defects, especially, in, their, 'T', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', major, defect, in, 'T', cells, of, patients, with, 'HNC', or, other, types, of, cancer, is, low, 'CD3zeta', expression, that, correlates, with, poor, 'prognosis,']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['proliferation,', apoptotic, 'profile,', abnormal, cytokine, secretion, and, poor, abilities, of, destructing, cancer, 'HNC', 'migration,', and, also]), verbo([increase]), complemento(['CD3zeta', and, 'CD3epsilon', 'expression,', of, peripheral, 'T', cells, purified, from, the, blood, of, five, 'HNC', patients])]). 'DAMP'])]). relacion([sujeto([dsRNA, alone, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, expression, of, multiple, growth, factors, in, 'keratinocytes,', endothelial, 'cells,', and, complemento([by, keratinocytes, in, these, conditions, 'included,', but, were, not, limited, 'to,', basic, fibroblast, growth, factor, '(', 'FGF2),', 'heparin-binding', 'EGF-like', growth, factor, the, unresponsive, 'lesions,', the, 'erythema/red', 'pseudo-network', '(', '"', 'strawberry")', pattern, was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([significantly, in, the, cured, lesions])]). 'HCV', core, protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, hypothesized, that, 'AAK1', and, 'GAK']), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['HCV', entry, independently, of, their, effect, on, 'HCV', relacion([sujeto(['Information', flows, through, a, signaling, pathway, by, sequential, interactions, between, core, components, of, the, 'pathway,', many, of, which]), verbo([have]), complemento([enzymatic, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Adaptor', proteins, do, not, directly]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, relaying, the, signal, and, do, not, have, enzymatic, 'activity,', but, are, important, for, signaling, because, they, facilitate, interactions, between, the, core, components])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', authors, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, differences, in, 'EGFR', signaling, between, different, cell, types, likely, resulted, from, the, variable, abundance, of, feedback, regulators])]). relacion([sujeto(['TNBC', is, an, important, clinical, challenge, because, it, does, not]), verbo([respond]), complemento([well, to, endocrine, therapy, and, have, a, higher, rate, of, early, recurrence, and, distant, metastasis, following, chemotherapy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, that, the, epidermal, growth, factor, receptor, '(', 'EGFR)', was, overexpressed, in, '~80%', of, 'TNBC,', 'anti-EGFR', therapy, showed, limited, clinical, benefit, according, to, phase, 'II', studies])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, first, observed, that, knockdown, of, the, transcriptional, coactivator, with, 'PDZ-binding', domain, '(', 'TAZ)', gene, can]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, sensitivity, of, 'TNBC', cell, lines, to, 'EGFR', inhibitors, '(', 'EGFRI)', in, a, cell, 'context-depended', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', in, certain, breast, cancer, cell, lines, the, 'YES-associated', 'protein,', paralog, of, 'TAZ', '(', 'YAP)', expression, can, be, upregulated, by, 'TAZ', inhibition, which]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, 'EGFRI', resistance])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, specific, inhibitor, to, 'TAZ/YAP', combined, with, 'anti-EGFR', therapy, may, prove, effective, and, provide, a, reason, why, targeting, 'EGFR', showed, limited, clinical, benefit, in, 'TNBC', treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, shown, that, 'Mig-6']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([cell, migration, via, direct, interaction, with, the, 'ErbB', 'receptors,', thereby, inhibiting, 'cross-phosphorylation', or, targeting, the, receptors, for, degradation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mig-6']), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, shown, to, bind, to, and, inhibit, the, 'Rho', 'GTPase', 'Cdc42', to, suppress, cytoskeletal, rearrangement])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, molecular, 'mechanism(s)', by, which, 'Mig-6']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([cell, migration, via, 'Cdc42', is, still, not, entirely, clear])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'Mig-6']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'Cdc42', is, necessary, and, sufficient, to, inhibit, 'EGF-induced', filopodia, formation, and, migration])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', 'binding,']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, four, specific, residues, '(', 'I11,', 'R12,', 'M26,', 'R30)', in, the, 'Mig-6', 'CRIB', 'domain,', is, essential, for, 'Mig-6', function])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mig-6', 'CRIB', 'domain,', 'alone,', is, sufficient, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([cell, migration])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,', 'Mig-6']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'EGFR', is, dispensable, for, 'Mig-6-mediated', inhibition, of, cell, migration])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', our, results, demonstrate, that, 'Mig-6', inhibition, of, 'Cdc42', signaling, is, critical, in, 'Mig-6', function, to]), verbo([suppress]), complemento([cell, migration, and, that, dysregulation, of, this, pathway, may, play, a, critical, role, in, cancer, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rab-coupling', protein, '(', 'RCP)', dependent, 'co-trafficking', of, α5β1, 'mice,', a, model, of, familial, adenomatous, polyposis, '(', 'FAP)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Lastly,', to, validate, 'ERBB', as, a, valid]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, 'vaccination,', we, 'cell-derived', sensory, neurons, can, be, cultured, with, rat, 'Schwann', 'cells,', and, have, produced, for, the, first, time, 'long-term', and, stable, myelinating, 'co-cultures', with, human, enhances, 'myelination,', while, conversely, pharmacological, blockade, of, the, 'NRG1-ErbB', pathway, prevents, 'myelination,', providing, direct, evidence, for, the, ability, of, this, pathway, to, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['complement-independent', demyelination])]). relacion([sujeto(['Myelinating', 'co-cultures', using, human]), verbo([induced]), complemento([pluripotent, stem, relacion([sujeto(['We', now, demonstrate, the, utility, of, this, approach, for, investigating, 'RTK', heteromerization, by, examining, the, functional, interaction, between, the, epidermal, growth, relacion([sujeto(['Similarly,', 'EGF', stimulation]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([a, specific, 'BRET', signal, between, 'HER3/Rluc8', and, 'Grb2/Venus', only, when, 'EGFR', was, 'co-expressed'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', truncation, of, 'HER3', to, remove, the, putative, 'Grb2']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, appears, to, abolish, 'EGF-induced', 'Grb2', recruitment, to, the, 'EGFR-HER3', heteromer])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, support, the, concept, that, 'EGFR']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'Grb2', in, both, constitutive, and, 'EGF-dependent', manners, and, this, interaction, is, independent, of, 'HER3', 'co-expression'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'HER3-Grb2', interaction]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, heteromerization, between, 'EGFR', and, 'HER3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Toll-like', receptors, '(', 'TLRs)']), verbo([recognize]), complemento([specific, microbial, products, and, complemento([in, the, infection, of, 'fibroblasts,', and, the, gHgLpUL128L, pentamer, is, required, for, infection, of, 'endothelial,', epithelial, and, myeloid, 'cells(2-5)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two']), verbo([reports]), complemento([suggested, that, gB, binds, to, 'ErbB1', and, 'PDGFRα', '(', refs, 6, ',', 7, ')', ;, 'however,', these, results, do, not, explain, the, tropism, of, the, virus, and, were, recently, 'challenged(8,9)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, 19, 'Å', reconstruction, for, the, gHgLgO, trimer, and, show, that, it, binds, with, high, affinity, through, the, gO, subunit, to, 'PDGFRα,', which, is, expressed, on, fibroblasts, but, not, on, epithelial, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, the, trimer, is, essential, for, viral, entry, in, both, fibroblasts, and, epithelial, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, identify, the, 'pentamer,', which, is, essential, for, infection, of, epithelial, 'cells,', as, a]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([for, the, 'ErbB', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings, help, explain, the, broad, tropism, of, human, cytomegalovirus, and, indicate, that, 'PDGFRα', and, the, viral, gO, subunit, could, be]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([by, novel, 'anti-viral', therapies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', some, endocannabinoids, were]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, show, 'anti-inflammatory', and, 'anti-allergic', activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', arachidonoyl, endocannabinoids, with, a, low, 'cytotoxicity,', only, 'NA-5HT', remarkably]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, release, of, 'β-hexosaminidase', '(', 'IC(50),', 13.58, 'μM),', a, marker, of, 'degranulation,', and, tumor, necrosis, 'factor-α', '(', 'IC(50),', 12.52, 'μM),', a, 'pro-inflammatory', 'cytokine,', in, 'IgE-activated', 'RBL-2H3', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Additionally,', 'NA-5HT', markedly]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, formation, of, prostaglandin, 'D(2)', '(', 'PGD(2))', with, 'IC(50)', value, of, 1.27, μM, and, leukotriene, 'B(4)', '(', 'LTB(4))', with, 'IC(50)', value, of, 1.2, 'μM,', and, slightly, 'LTC4'])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', effect, of, 'NA-5HT', on, early, stage, of, 'FcεRI', cascade, was, 'investigated,', it, significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, 'Syk,', but, not, 'Lyn'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'NA-5HT']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, 'PLCγ1/2', and, 'PKCδ,', related, to, degranulation, 'process,', as, well, as, phosphorylation, of, 'LAT,', 'ERK1/2,', 'p38,', 'JNK,', 'Gab2,', 'PI3K', and, 'Akt,', implicated, in, the, expression, of, 'pro-inflammatory', cytokines])]). relacion([sujeto(['Additionally,', 'NA-5HT', significantly, reduced, the, level, of, 'p40(phox),', and, partially]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'p47(phox)', and, 'p67(phox)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['From', these, 'results,', it, is]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'NA-5HT', expresses, 'anti-allergic', action, by, suppressing, the, activation, of, 'Syk,', 'LAT,', 'p38,', 'JNK,', 'PI3K', and, 'Akt,', as, well, as, the, expression, of, 'ERK1/2', and, 'NADPH', oxidase, subunits])]). relacion([sujeto(['Microtubules', and, 'Grb2']), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, the, 'carboxyl-terminal', 'proline/arginine-rich', domain, '(', 'PRD),', whereas, phosphoinositides, bind, to, the, pleckstrin, homology, '(', 'PH)', domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, study, we, tested, the, effect, of, different, phosphoinositides, on, dynamin, 'GTPase', activity, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, best, activator, is, phosphatidylinositol, 4, ',', 5, -, bisphosphate, followed, by, 1, -, 'O-(1,', 2, -, 'di-O-palmitoyl-sn-glycerol-3-benzyloxyphosphoryl)-D-myo-inositol', 3, ',', 4, ',', 5, -, triphosphate])]). relacion([sujeto(['Phosphatidylinositol', 4, -, phosphate, was, a, weak, activator, and, phosphatidylinositol, 3, ',', 4, -, bisphosphate, did, not]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['GTPase', at, all])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Grb2', and, phosphatidylinositol, 4, ',', 5, -, bisphosphate, together, increased, the, dynamin, 'GTPase', activity, up, to, 4, -, fold, higher, than, that, obtained, by, these, activators, tested, 'separately,', and, also, reduced, the, dynamin, concentration, required, for, 'half-maximal', activities, by, 3, -, fold])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, both, stimulators, can]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, dynamin, simultaneously, resulting, in, superactivation, of, dynamin, 'GTPase', activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', propose, that, 'SH3-containing', proteins, such, as, 'Grb2']), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, the, dynamin, 'PRD', to, target, it, to, 'clathrin-coated', pits, and, prime, it, for, superactivation, by, phosphoinositides])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, the, purification, and, the, crystallization, of, the, modular, protein, 'Grb2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', protein, was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([as, a, fusion, with, 'glutathione-S-transferase', and, purified, by, affinity, chromatography, on, glutathione, agarose])]). relacion([sujeto(['Because', 'Grb2', appeared, to, be, extremely, sensitive, to, 'oxidation,', crystallization, experiments, were, performed, with, a, dialysis, button, technique]), verbo([involving]), complemento([daily, addition, of, fresh, 'DTT', to, the, reservoirs])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, are, discussed, in, relation, with, the]), verbo([modular]), complemento([nature, of, 'Grb2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', possibility, is, that, 'IFNs', block, growth, 'factor-induced', mitogenic, 'signaling,', which]), verbo([involves]), complemento([activation, of, 'Ras/Raf-1/MEK/mitogen-activated', protein, kinase])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([tested, this, hypothesis, by, using, 'HER14', cells, '(', 'NIH', 3, 'T3', cell, expressing, both, 'platelet-derived', growth, factor, '[', 'PDGF]', and, epidermal, growth, factor, '[', 'EGF]', 'receptors)', as, a, model, system])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'IFN-induced', inhibition]), verbo([acted]), complemento([upstream, of, 'Raf-1', kinase, and, downstream, of, diacyl, 'glycerol/phorbol', 'ester,', suggesting, that, protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)', is, the, potential, primary, target])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', these, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([elucidated, a, major, difference, in, the, early, events, of, 'EGF-and', 'PDGF-stimulated', signal, transduction, 'and,', more, 'importantly,', revealed, a, novel, mechanism, by, which, 'IFNs', may, execute, their, antiproliferative, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bifdobacteria', play, a, major, role, in, structuring, the, gut, microbiome, of, breastfed, infants, due, to, their, ability, to, consume, oligosaccharides]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, human, milk])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, that, bifidobacteria, are, often, absent, in, the, gut, microbiome, of, breastfed, infants, in, some, locations])]). relacion([sujeto(['Potential', mechanisms, by, which, these, relacion([sujeto(['Aberrant', gut, colonization, in, early, life]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, an, increased, risk, of, noncommunicable, diseases, in, later, life])]). relacion([sujeto(['Epidemiological', and, experimental, studies]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, causal, relationship, between, 'early-life', gut, microbiota, perturbations, and, disease, risk])]). relacion([sujeto(['Perinatal', antibiotic, 'exposure,', cesarean, section, 'delivery,', postnatal, antibiotic, 'administration,', and, formula, 'feeding,', which, may, disrupt, intestinal, 'microecology,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, associated, with, disease, development, in, later, life])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', first, endocrinopathy, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([at, a, mean, age, of, 7.4, '(', 5.0, -, 13.2, ')', 'years,', 2.4, '(', 0, -, 6.7, ')', years, after, tumour, diagnosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([growth, thyrotropin, deficiency, '(', 2.7, '%', ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', order, to, assess, if, bioaugmentation, can]), verbo([increase]), complemento([soil, quality, and, 'fertility,', decrease, 'metal(loid)', mobility, and, accelerate, plant, 'colonization,', a, 'one-year', field, experiment, was, designed, with, creation, of, 'Technosols', in, two, tailings, ponds, with, different, pH, '(', relacion([sujeto(['The', soluble, fraction, of, 'As']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['~45%', in, 'AT,', related, to, increases, in, pH, up, to, 'neutrality,', while, increased, '~90%', in, 'NT', verbo([increase]), complemento([richness, and, plant, density, were, microbial, biomass, and, 'N'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'CpG1', methylation, of, the, 'PDGFD', promoter, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, apolipoprotein, 'E', '(', 'APOE)', levels, in, 'IA', patients, '(', p, =, 0.013, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, study]), verbo([has]), complemento([demonstrated, significant, correlations, between, 'DNA', methylation, of, the, 'PDGFD', gene, promoter, and, the, risk, of, developing, either, 'IA', or, 'BAVM'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', plants]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, plasticity, in, their, defense, mechanisms, enabling, them, to, tolerate, 'and,', 'sometimes,', even, survive, adverse, environmental, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['MicroRNAs', '(', 'miRNAs)', are, small, 'non-coding', 'RNAs,', approximately, 19, -, 21, nucleotides, in, 'length,', and, are, being, increasingly]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, regulators, of, gene, expression, at, the, 'post-transcriptional', level, and, have, the, ability, to, influence, a, broad, range, of, biological, processes])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', is, growing, evidence, in, the, literature, that, reprogramming, of, gene, expression]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, 'miRNAs,', is, a, major, defense, mechanism, in, plants, enabling, them, to, respond, to, stresses])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', 'date,', numerous, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([established, the, importance, of, 'miRNA-based', regulation, of, gene, expression, under, low, temperature, stress])]). relacion([sujeto(['Individual', miRNAs, can]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([the, expression, of, multiple, mRNA, targets, 'and,', 'therefore,', the, manipulation, of, a, single, miRNA, has, the, potential, to, affect, multiple, biological, processes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Numerous', functional, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([attempted, to, identify, the, 'miRNA-target', interactions, and, have, elaborated, the, role, of, several, miRNAs, in, 'cold-stress', regulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', review, summarizes, the, current, understanding, of, 'miRNA-mediated', modulation, of, the, expression, of, key, genes, as, well, as, genetic, and, regulatory, 'pathways,']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, low, temperature, stress, responses, in, plants])]). relacion([sujeto(['Honeybees', face, many, parasites, and, pathogens, and, consequently, rely, on, a, diverse, set, of, individual, and, 'group-level', defenses, to]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['Possibly', playing, a, vital, role, in, honeybee, 'health,', it, is, important, that, these, honeybee, specific, 'Lactic', 'Acid', 'Bacterial', '(', 'hbs-LAB)', symbionts, can, be, correctly, 'identified,', isolated, and, 'cultured,', to, further, investigate, their, health]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([properties])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, reported, successful, identification, to, the, strain, level, by, complemento([constantly, failed, to, identify, the, 13, 'hbs-LAB', from, honeybee, samples, by, using, inadequate, media, 'and/or', molecular, techniques, based, on, 16, 'S', rRNA, gene, sequencing, with, insufficient, discriminatory, power])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, proposed, that, protein, supplementation, during, resistance, exercise, training, enhances, muscle, hypertrophy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Healthy', young, men]), verbo([participated]), complemento([in, supervised, whole, body, progressive, resistance, training, 3, 'd/wk', for, 12, weeks])]). did, not]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([resistance, 'exercise-induced', increases, in, myofiber, 'hypertrophy,', satellite, cell, content, or, myonuclear, addition, in, young, healthy, men])]). histone, 'H3', 'tri-methyl', 'K9', epigenetic, mark, at, subcytotoxic, concentrations])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', emerging, evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([demonstrated, that, 'metastasis-associated', lung, adenocarcinoma, transcript, 1, '(', 'MALAT1),', a, long, 'non-coding', 'RNAs', '(', 'lncRNAs),', contributes, to, the, initiation, and, development, of, 'tumors,', including, osteosarcoma, '(', 'OS)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Multiple', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([suggested, an, oncogenic, role, of, 'MALAT1', and, 'high-mobility', group, protein, 'B1', '(', 'HMGB1)', in, 'OS', tumorigenesis, and, 'metastasis,', but, the, effects, and, mechanisms, are, not, unanimous])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, showed, that, 'MALAT1', and, 'HMGB1', were, were, most, obvious, in, the, 10, 'μg/ml', group])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'IFN-γ']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([cell, growth, and, the, expression, of, the, 'ADAM33', gene, in, relacion([sujeto(['Sulforaphene', '(', 'SFE),', a, naturally, occurring, isothiocyanate]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, cruciferous, 'vegetables,', has, attracted, increasing, attention, for, its, '(', 'IAB)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, associated, with, 'AF'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', different, surveys]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([a, total, of, 9380, participants, from, 1999, to, 2005, ;, all, participants, were, invited, to, a, second, examination, between, 2009, and, 2013])]). relacion([sujeto(['P-wave', duration, and, the, presence, of, partial, or, advanced, 'IAB', were]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'AF'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', 'P-wave', longer, than, 110, milliseconds]), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, risk, of, 'AF'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Advanced', 'IAB', morphology, did, not, seem, to]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, additional, 'AF', risk, beyond, that, of, 'P-wave', duration])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, common, to]), verbo([find]), complemento([a, high, variability, in, the, accuracy, of, heart, failure, '(', 'HF)', diagnosis, in, electronic, primary, care, medical, promoter, to, drive, 'stress-inducible', expression, of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, imparting, tolerance, to, multiple, stresses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Intrinsically', disordered, proteins, '(', 'IDPs)', often, rely, on, electrostatic, interactions, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([their, structured, targets])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', obtain, insight, into, the, mechanism, of, formation, of, the, electrostatic, encounter, 'complex,', we, investigated, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, the, peptide, 'Sos', '(', 'PPPVPPRRRR),', which, serves, as, a, minimal, model, for, an, 'IDP,', to, the, 'c-Crk', 'N-terminal', 'SH3', domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Initially,', we, measured, '¹⁵N', relaxation, rates, at, two, magnetic, field, strengths, and, determined, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([shifts, for, the, complex, of, 'Sos', with, 'wild-type', 'SH3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, recorded, a, 3, μs, molecular, dynamics, '(', 'MD)', trajectory, of, this, complex, using, the, 'Amber', 'ff99SB*-ILDN', force, field])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', comparison, of, the, experimental, and, simulated, data, shows, that, 'MD', simulation, consistently, overestimates, the, strength, of, salt, bridge, interactions, at, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([interface])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', address, this, 'issue,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([devised, an, empirical, correction, to, the, 'Amber', 'ff99SB*-ILDN', force, field, whereby, the, 'Lennard-Jones', equilibrium, distance, for, the, 'nitrogen-oxygen', pair, across, the, 'Arg-to-Asp', and, 'Arg-to-Glu', salt, bridges, has, been, increased, by, 3, '%'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Adjusting', the, strength, of, salt, bridge, of, the, peptide])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'arginine-rich', 'C-terminal', portion, of, the, 'peptide,', freed, from, the, effect, of, the, overstabilized, salt, 'bridges,', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, interconvert, more, rapidly, between, its, multiple, conformational, states])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', modified, 'MD', protocol]), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, successfully, used, to, simulate, the, entire, binding, process])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', then, arrived, at, the, correct]), verbo([bound]), complemento([pose, within, '∼2', 'Å', of, the, crystallographic, coordinates])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', simulation, allowed, us, to, analyze, the, details, of, the, dynamic]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['intermediate,', i])]). complemento([and, shift, the, equilibrium, toward, the, intermediate, state, resembling, the, electrostatic, encounter, complex])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results, of, the, combined, 'NMR', and, of, 'Ras']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, difficult, to, achieve])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, identification, of, small, molecules, that, bind, to, a, '(', 'SOS1)', gene]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, 'non-syndromic', 'HGF', in, a, 'Brazilian', family])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'SOS1', may, not, be, the, gene, responsible, for, 'HGF', in, these, three, 'Chinese', families, 'and,', 'therefore,', it, is, possible, that, other, genes, are, involved, in, the, manifestation, of, 'HGF', in, these, 'Chinese', 'HGF', families])]). relacion([sujeto(['Genetic', sequencing, analyses, were, performed, to, detect, any, of, the, known, mutations]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, 'HGF', and, 'AI'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sequencing', genetic, analysis, failed, to, identify, any, of, the, common, mutations]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, family])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', refined, the, 'GINGF3', locus, to, a, 6.56, -, 'cM,', 8.27, -, 'Mb', region, containing, 112, known, and, hypothetical, 'genes,', and, our, data, and, a, 'PH,', a, complex, of, 'IRS-1-GRB-2']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'dynamin-II,', indicating, that, 'GRB-2', may, transduce, signals, from, 'IRS-1', to, 'dynamin-II'])]). as, a, constitutively, activated, 'Met'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', action, of, 'HGF/SF', on, cells, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, autophosphorylation, of, 'Met', on, two, complemento([that, 'Tpr-Met', efficiently, activates, the, uPA, gene, via, a, 'SOS/Ras/extracellular', signal, regulated, kinase, '(', 'ERK)-dependent', signaling, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutation', of, 'Y1356,', which, abrogates, 'GRB2', 'binding,', reduced, the, induction, to, half, of, the, control, 'level,', while, mutation, of, 'Y1349', showed, little, effect, on, uPA, 'induction,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([an, important, but, partly, replaceable, role, for, 'GRB2', in, 'Met-dependent', uPA, gene, induction])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutation', of, complemento([a, potential, role, for, 'PI', 3, -, kinase])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, interplay, among, different, signaling, molecules, on, the, receptor, is, important, for, full, induction, of, the, pathway, leading, to, the, activation, of, the, uPA, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Phosphotyrosine', peptide]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'Grb2', induces, tryptophan, fluorescence, changes, in, the, 'Src', homology, 2, '(', 'SH2)', domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Affinities', are, in, the, nanomolar, 'range,', the, 'Shc', peptide, having, the, highest, 'affinity,', followed, by, peptides, mimicking, 'Grb2']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, on, 'EGF', and, 'HGF', 'receptors,', the, putative, sites, on, insulin, and, 'IGF-1', receptors, having, much, lower, affinities])]). relacion([sujeto(['Proline-rich', peptide]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'SH3', domains, induces, fluorescence, changes, mainly, in, the, 'C-terminal', 'SH3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Additional', residues, before, this, 'PVPPPVPP', motif]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, minor, contribution, to, the, 'binding,', but, the, two, residues, after, this, motif, are, important, and, may, contribute, to, specificity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', affinity, of, each, 'SH3', for, each, 'proline-rich', motif, is, too, low, to, account, for, the, high, stability, of, the, 'Grb2-Sos', 'complex,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'Grb2', recognizes, other, structural, features, in, the, 'Sos', 'C-terminus'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Binding', of, a, phosphotyrosine, peptide, to, the, 'SH2']), verbo([has]), complemento([no, effect, on, the, 'SH3s'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus', the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'Grb2', to, a, receptor, or, to, an, associated, protein, phosphorylated, on, tyrosines, is, unlikely, to, activate, the, exchange, factor, activity, of, 'Sos', through, a, conformational, change, transmitted, from, the, 'SH2', to, the, 'SH3', domains])]). relacion([sujeto(['Signaling', by, tyrosine, kinase, receptors, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, selective, interactions, between, individual, 'Src', homology, 2, '(', 'SH2)', domains, of, cytoplasmic, effectors, and, specific, phosphotyrosine, residues, in, the, activated, receptor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, existence, in, the, hepatocyte, growth, 'factor/scatter', factor, '(', 'HGF/SF)', receptor, of, a, multifunctional, docking, site, made, of, the, tandemly, arranged, degenerate, sequence, 'YVH/NV'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, this, site]), verbo([mediates]), complemento(['intermediate-', to, 'high-affinity', interactions, with, multiple, 'SH2-containing', signal, 'transducers,', including, phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, 'kinase,', phospholipase, 'C', 'gamma,', 'pp60c-src,', and, the, 'GRB-2-Sos', complex])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutation', of, the, two, tyrosines, results, in]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, biological, 'function,', as, shown, by, abrogation, of, the, transforming, activity, in, the, oncogenic, counterpart, of, the, receptor])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', same, bidentate, motif, is]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([in, the, evolutionarily, related, receptors, 'Sea', and, 'Ron,', suggesting, that, in, all, members, of, the, 'HGF/SF', receptor, 'family,', signal, transduction, is, channeled, through, a, multifunctional, binding, site])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Ras/mitogen']), verbo([activated]), complemento([protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', pathway, is, essential, in, the, regulation, of, cell, 'cycle,', 'differentiation,', 'growth,', cell, senescence, and, 'apoptosis,', all, of, which, are, critical, to, normal, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', class, of, neurodevelopmental, 'disorders,', 'RASopathies,', is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, germline, mutations, in, genes, of, the, 'Ras/MAPK', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Through', the, use, of, whole, exome, sequencing, and]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([sequencing, of, selected, genes, in, cohorts, of, 'panel-negative', 'RASopathy', 'patients,', several, new, genes, have, been, identified])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', recent]), verbo([reports]), complemento([have, demonstrated, that, chromosomal, copy, number, variation, in, regions, encompassing, 'Ras/MAPK', pathway, genes, may, be, a, novel, pathogenetic, mechanism, expanding, the, 'RASopathies'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Various', genetic, mutations]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, cancer, are, known, to, alter, cell, 'signaling,', but, it, is, not, clear, whether, they, dysregulate, signaling, pathways, by, altering, the, abundance, of, pathway, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', a, combination, of, 'RNA', sequencing, and, ultrasensitive]), verbo([targeted]), complemento(['proteomics,', we, defined, the, primary, 'components-16', core, proteins, and, 10, feedback, 'regulators-of', the, epidermal, growth, factor, of, normal, and, breast, cancer, cell, lines, as, well, as, fibroblasts])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, core, pathway, proteins, were, present, at, very, similar, concentrations, across, all, cell, 'types,', with, a, variance, similar, to, that, of, proteins, previously, shown, to, display, conserved, abundances, across, species])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', absolute, abundance, of, most, core, proteins, was, between, 50, ',', 0, and, 70, ',', 0, copies, per, 'cell,', but, the, adaptors, 'SOS1,', 'SOS2,', and, 'GAB1', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([at, far, lower, amounts, '(', 2000, to, 5000, copies, per, 'cell)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, relative, stoichiometry, of, core, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', performed, 'low-coverage', genome, and, 'high-coverage', exome, sequencing, of, 20, desmoplastic, 'melanomas,', followed, by]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([sequencing, of, 293, genes, in, a, validation, cohort, of, 42, cases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Instead,', other, genetic, alterations, known, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, to, 'ERK'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Similar', to, 'NS-causing', 'SOS1', 'mutations,', the, phenotype]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'SOS2', defects, is, characterized, by, normal, shoot, tissues])]). relacion([sujeto(['Genetic', experiments, indicated, that, the, mutation, of, 'SCABP8']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([the, 'ant-knockout', 'salt-tolerant', 'phenotype,', complemento([that, 'ANT', is, a, novel, regulator, of, salt, stress, and, that, 'ANT', binds, to, the, 'SCABP8', 'promoter,', mediating, salt, tolerance])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Chk1', protein, relacion([sujeto(['Herein,', using, an, array, of, biophysical, 'methods,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, although, the, 'Grb2', adaptor, can, potentially, bind, to, all, four, 2, :, 1, stoichiometry])]). relacion([sujeto(['Strikingly,', such, bivalent]), verbo([binding]), complemento([appears, to, be, driven, by, the, association, of, the, 'Grb2', homodimer, to, only, two, of, four, potential, 'PXψPXR', motifs, within, 'Sos1', at, any, one, time])]). relacion([sujeto(['Of', particular, interest, is, the, observation, that, of, a, possible, six, pairwise, combinations, in, which, 'S1-S4', motifs, may]), verbo([act]), complemento([in, concert, for, the, docking, of, the, 'Grb2', homodimer, through, bivalent, 'binding,', only, 'S1', and, 'S3,', 'S1', and, 'S4,', 'S2', and, 'S4,', and, 'S3', and, 'S4', do, 'so,', while, pairwise, combinations, of, sites, 'S1', and, 'S2', and, sites, 'S2', and, 'S3', appear, to, afford, only, monovalent, binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['Importantly,', the, presence, of, multiple]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, within, 'Sos1', appears, to, provide, a, physical, route, for, 'Grb2', to, hop, in, a, 'flip-flop', manner, from, one, site, to, the, next, through, facilitated, 'diffusion,', and, such, rapid, exchange, forms, the, basis, of, positive, cooperativity, driving, the, bivalent, binding, of, 'Grb2', to, 'Sos1', with, high, affinity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Arabidopsis']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, a, favorite, model, system, for, plant, biologist])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'endeavor,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, identified, 'SOS', family, members, from, 'Brassica', juncea, in, our, laboratory, and, reported, their, salinity, responsive, relacion([sujeto(['However,', genomic, and, cDNA, sequences, of, the, 'HvCBL4', alleles, were, 'obtained,']), verbo([revealed]), complemento([a, single, 'Ala111Thr', amino, acid, substitution, difference, in, the, encoded, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', position, in, 'SOS3', corresponding, to, the, barley, substitution, does, not]), verbo([participate]), complemento([directly, in, of, 'Arabidopsis', 'roots,', or, it, may, function, as, a, 'Na(+)/H(+)', antiporter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Amiloride', affects, 'SOS1', and, other, 'Na(+)/H(+)', antiporters, in, plant, cells, complemento([by, 'calcium-SOS3', and, by, phosphorylation, at, its, activation, loop])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', changing, 'Ser228', to, 'Asp', to, mimic, the, autophosphorylation]), complemento([by, 'NMDA', treatment, of, cortical, neuronal, cultures, from, 'Sos2-/-', newborn, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, imply, that, 'Sos1', is, the, major, regulator, of, these, verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'TNFR1', in, tumor, necrosis, 'factor-alpha', '(', 'TNFalpha)-induced', activation, of, 'NF-kappaB,', 'MAPK,', 'ERK1/2,', 'JNK,', and, p38])]). to, external, stimuli])]). relacion([sujeto(['Calcineurin', 'B-like', '(', 'CBL)', proteins, and, their]), verbo([target]), complemento(['kinases,', 'CBL-interacting', protein, kinases, '(', 'motif)', within, the, 'C-terminal', regulatory, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ca(2+)', are, coordinated, within, four, 'EF', hands, in, 'AtCBL2', in]), verbo([bound]), complemento([form])]). verbo([confer]), complemento([binding, affinity, and, specificity])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'plants,', the, calcineurin, 'B-like', protein, '(', 'CBL)', family, represents, a, unique, group, of, 'CIPKs)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, that, the, 'CBL', protein, 'CBL10', functions, as, a, crucial, regulator, of, salt, tolerance, in, 'Arabidopsis'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', the, 'Na(+)', content, of, the, cbl10, 'mutant,', unlike, other, 'salt-sensitive', mutants, identified, thus, 'far,', was, significantly, lower, than, in, the, wild, type, under, either, normal, or, 'high-salt', 'conditions,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'CBL10', mediates, a, novel, 'Ca(2+)-signaling', pathway, for, salt, tolerance])]). relacion([sujeto(['Indeed,', the, 'CBL10', protein, physically]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, 'salt-tolerance', factor, 'CIPK24', '(', 'SOS2),', and, the, 'CBL10-CIPK24', '(', 'SOS2)', complex, is, associated, with, the, vacuolar, compartments, that, are, responsible, for, salt, storage, and, detoxification, in, plant, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'CBL10', and, 'CIPK24', '(', 'SOS2)', constitute, a, novel, 'salt-tolerance', pathway, that, regulates, the, 'sequestration/compartmentalization', of, 'Na(+)', in, plant, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Because', 'CIPK24', '(', 'SOS2)', also]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'CBL4', '(', 'SOS3)', and, regulates, salt, export, across, the, plasma, 'CBL', calcium, sensors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Salt', stress]), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, degradation, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, 'proteins,', and, affects, the, localization, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, λ])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', the, modulation, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, protein, stability, and, the, subcellular, localization, of, these, proteins, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, salt, tolerance, in, plants])]). relacion([sujeto(['Salt', tolerance, in, plants, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, multiple, signaling, 'pathways,', including, the, salt, overly, sensitive, '(', 'SOS)', 'pathway,', of, which, the, 'SOS2', protein, is, a, key, component])]). relacion([sujeto(['SOS2', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([under, salt, stress, to, enhance, salt, tolerance, in, plants])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', proteins]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'SOS2', to, inhibit, its, kinase, activity, under, normal, growth, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', '(', 'Zhou', et, al])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, salt, stress, promotes, the, degradation, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, λ, and, 'κ,', at, least, in, part, via, the, relacion([sujeto(['Salt', stress, also, partially]), verbo([represses]), complemento([the, interaction, of, 'SOS2', and, 14, -, 3, -, 3, λ, at, the, 'PM,', but, activates, 'PM-localized', 'SOS2'])]). not, 'known,', and, it, could, not]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, without, the, large, pedigrees])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', these, 'applications,', 'gene-', and, 'enzyme-replacement', strategies, are, promising, approaches, to, treat, inherited, diseases, that, may, benefit, from, protein, engineering, 'techniques,', even, though, these, beneficial, effects]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, largely, unexplored])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, study, we, apply, a, 'sequence-alignment', statistics, procedure, '(', 'consensus-based', 'approach)', to, improve, the, activity, and, stability, of, the, human, 'AGT', '(', 'alanine-glyoxylate', 'aminotransferase)', 'protein,', an, enzyme, which]), verbo([causes]), complemento(['PH1', '(', primary, hyperoxaluria, 'type\240\I)', upon, mutation])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', combining, only, five, consensus, 'mutations,', we, obtain, a, variant, '(', 'AGT-RHEAM)', with, largely]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['in\240\vitro', thermal, and, kinetic, 'stability,', increased, 'activity,', and, with, no, side, effects, on, foldability, and, peroxisomal, targeting, in, mammalian, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', structure, of, 'AGT-RHEAM']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([changes, at, the, dimer, interface, and, improved, electrostatic, interactions, responsible, for, increased, interaction, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, 'C-terminal', regulatory, domain, of, 'SOS2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['SOS3']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['SOS2', protein, kinase, activity, in, a, 'Ca(2+)-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Genome-wide', association, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, &, 'gt;50', common, variants, associated, with, complemento([the, salt, tolerance, and, consequently, rice, production, in, the, 'salinity-affected', areas])]). relacion([sujeto(['Non-uniform', root, salinity]), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, 'Na(+)efflux,', water, 'use,', and, growth, of, the, root, in, 'non-saline', 'side,', which, may, be, regulated, by, some, form, of, signaling, induced, by, the, 'high-salinity', side])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, signaling, and, its, specific, function]), verbo([have]), complemento([remained, unknown])]). relacion([sujeto([',', we, showed, that, the, 'up-regulated', contents, in, roots, in, the, 'non-saline', side, 'increased,', possibly, due, to, the]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, their, key, biosynthesis, 'genes,', 'NCED', and, 'RBOHC,', complemento([to, two, types, of, 'lectin,', 'Ricinus', communis, agglutinin, 120, '(', 'RCA120)', and, 'Galectin-3', '(', 'Gal-3)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These']), verbo([binding]), complemento([studies, show, quick, association, and, slow, dissociation, with, a, moderate, binding, affinity, between, 'PPc', and, 'Gal-3', of, 1.26, μM])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', interaction, between, 'PPc', and, 'Gal-3']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([the, potential, use, of, pumpkin, pectic, polysaccharide, as, a, 'Gal-3', inhibitor, in, functional, food, or, drug, development, applications])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro, studies, showed, that, 'ASKP-1', markedly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, release, of, cytotoxic, molecules, '(', 'NO', and, 'ROS)', and, with, 'BRAF(V600E)', mutant, protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'RAF', isoform, 'ARAF', has, an, obligatory, role, in, promoting, 'MAPK', activity, and, cell, migration, in, a, cell, 'type-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Knocking', down, 'ARAF']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, activation, of, 'MAPK', kinase, 1, '(', 'MEK1)', and, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinase, 1, and, 2, '(', 'ERK1/2)', and, decreased, the, number, of, protrusions, from, tumor, cell, spheroids, in, 'three-dimensional', culture, that, were, induced, by, 'BRAF(V600E)-specific', or, 'BRAF/CRAF', inhibitors, '(', 'GDC-0879', and, 'sorafenib,', 'respectively)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['RAF', inhibitors]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, homodimerization, of, 'ARAF', and, the, heterodimerization, of, 'BRAF', with, 'CRAF', and, the, scaffolding, protein, 'KSR1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', a, purified, protein, 'solution,', recombinant, proteins, of, the, three, 'RAF', isoforms, competed, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'MEK1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', cells, in, 'culture,', overexpressing, mutants, of, 'ARAF', that, could, not, homodimerize, impaired, the, interaction, between, 'ARAF', and, endogenous, 'MEK1', and, thus]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, subsequent, activation, of, 'MEK1', and, 'ERK1/2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, new, role, for, 'ARAF', in, directly, activating, the, 'MAPK', cascade, and, promoting, tumor, cell, invasion, and, suggest, a, new, therapeutic, target, for, 'RAS-', and, 'RAF-mediated', cancers])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, issue, of, 'Blood,', 'Nelson', et, al, describe, a, novel, somatic, 'ARAF', 'vemurafenib,', a, 'BRAF', 'inhibitor,', indicating, the, importance, of, fully, evaluating, 'ERK', pathway, abnormalities, in, selecting, 'LCH', patients, for, targeted, inhibitor, therapy])]). and, an, indicator, of, sorafenib, response])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ret/PTC', 'rearrangements,', 'RAS', and, 'BRAF', 'mutations,', the, main, 'non-overlapping', genetic, alterations, all]), frequent]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, 'BRAF-mutant', cancer, mortality, worldwide])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas', most, tumor, types, harbor, predominantly, the, 'BRAF(V600E)-mutant', relacion([sujeto(['MAP1LC3B/LC3B', '(', 'microtubule-']), verbo([associated]), complemento([protein, 1, light, chain, 3, 'β)', is, conjugated, with, phosphatidylethanolamine, '(', 'PE)', in, the, multiple, flooding, scenarios])]). relacion([sujeto(['Many', edible, mushrooms]), verbo([have]), complemento([become, attractive, as, '"', health, 'foods"', and, as, source, materials, for, 'citrinopileatus,', 'PCPS,', we, analyzed, its, effects, on, the, function, of, human, dendritic, cells, '(', 'DCs)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', showed, that, 'PCPS']), verbo([induces]), complemento([upregulation, of, the, surface, maturation, markers, 'CD80,', 'CD86', and, 'HLA-DR', on, 'DCs,', indicating, its, potential, to, induce, 'DC', maturation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', analysis, of, 'PCPS']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, this, polysaccharide, is, a, 'β-1,3-branched', 'β-1,6-glucan,', which, is, in, line, with, its, capacity, to, activate, 'Dectin-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', showed, that, 'PCPS', can]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['TLR2', and, 'TLR4,', but, not, 'TLR3,', signaling, using, 'TLR-HEK293', reporter, cell, lines])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', human, 'DCs,', the, effect, of, 'PCPS', was, additively]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, 'TLR4', 'activation,', and, synergistically, enhanced, by, stimulation, of, 'TLR2,', suggesting, that, interaction, of, 'PCPS', with, these, 'TLRs', contributes, to, the, observed, 'DC', modulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'PCPS']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, capacity, to, activate, human, 'DCs', via, multiple, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, the, benefits, of, combined, targeted, therapy, with, a, 'RAF-inhibitor', '(', 'Dabrafenib)', and, a, 'MEK-inhibitor', '(', 'Trametinib)', in, treating, 'V600', 'BRAF', mutant, 'cancers,', including, 'NSCLC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Non-V600', mutations, can, either]), verbo([increase]), complemento([or, impair, 'BRAF', kinase, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', impaired, 'BRAF', kinases, can, still]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'ERK', pathway, in, a, 'CRAF-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['ERK', activity]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, both, types, of, these, mutations, is, further, reduced, by, combinatorial, drug, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', the, combination]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, more, prolonged, 'ERK', inhibition, and, has, 'anti-proliferative', and, 'pro-apoptotic', effects, in, cells, harboring, both, types, of, 'non-V600', 'BRAF', mutations])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, basis, for, the, clinical, exploration, of, 'non-V600', 'BRAF', mutant, lung, cancers, upon, treatment, with, 'Trametinib', and, 'Dabrafenib'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', results]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'Newcastle', disease, virus, '(', 'NDV)', downregulates, the, intracellular, 'Raf', kinase, inhibitor, protein, '(', 'RKIP)', expression, for, efficient, 'replication,', suggesting, that, this, molecular, may, be, a, suitable, target, for, antiviral, intervention])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'work,', we, investigated, whether, or, not, the, 'Raf', kinase, inhibitor, 'V', '(', 'RKIV),', which, functions, in, the, same, way, as, 'RKIP', by]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([the, intracellular, 'Raf', 'kinase,', is, able, to, suppress, the, propagation, of, enzootic, virulent, 'NDV', 'in\240\vitro', and, 'in\240\vivo'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, clearly, showed, that, 'RKIV', treatment, protected, the, cells, from, 'NDV-induced', 'CPE', with, the, effective, concentrations, on, nM, 'level,', and]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([virus, replication, in, the, lungs, of, infected, chickens, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner, and, protected, chickens, from, the, lethal, infection, by, 'NDV'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', we, conclude, that, the, 'Raf', kinase, inhibitor, compound, 'RKIV,', by]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([the, host, cellular, target, 'Raf', 'kinase,', might, be, very, promising, as, a, new, class, of, antivirals, against, the, enzootic, virulent, 'NDV', infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, a, dimer, interface, region, in, the, 'RAF', kinase, domain, that, is, also, conserved, in, 'KSR,', a, scaffolding, protein, that, binds, 'RAF,', 'MEK', and, 'ERK'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Especially', little, is, known, about, the, molecular, mechanism]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, selection, of, the, dimerization, partner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previously,', we]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, 'Ras-dependent', binding, of, the, tumour, suppressor, 'DiRas3', to, 'C-RAF', inhibits, the, 'C-RAF:B-RAF', heterodimerization])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'DiRas3']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'KSR1', independently, of, its, interaction, with, activated, 'Ras', and, 'RAF'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data, also]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, depending, on, the, local, stoichiometry, between, 'DiRas3', and, oncogenic, 'Ras,', 'DiRas3', can, either, enhance, homodimerization, of, 'KSR1', or, recruit, 'KSR1', to, the, 'Ras:C-RAF', complex, and, thereby, reduce, the, availability, of, 'C-RAF', for, binding, to, 'B-RAF'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', 'mechanism,', which, is, shared, between, 'A-RAF', and, 'C-RAF,', may, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, 'Ras12V-induced', cell, transformation, by, 'DiRas3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, precise, mechanotransduction, mechanism, that]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([the, anabolic, reaction, of, osteoblasts, is, largely, unknown])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'A-Raf', and, 'C-Raf', were, involved, in, mechanobiological, osteogenesis, in, a, distinct, 'way:', 'A-Raf', was, responsible, for, osteogenesis, while, 'C-Raf', for, 'anti-apoptotic', protection, and, promotion])]). relacion([sujeto(['Plant', perception, of, 'pathogen-associated', molecular, patterns, '(', 'PAMPs)', and, other, environmental, stresses]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([transient, ion, fluxes, at, the, plasma, membrane])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'calmodulin-like', protein, 'CML9,', a, negative, modulator, of, 'flg22-triggered', 'immunity,']), verbo([interacted]), complemento(['with,', and, suppressed, 'ILK1', kinase, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['ILK1']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, and, promoted, the, accumulation, of, 'HAK5,', a, putative, '(', 'H(+))/K(+)', symporter, that, mediates, a, 'high-affinity', uptake, during, 'K(+)', deficiency])]). relacion([sujeto(['ILK1', or, 'HAK5', expression, was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, several, flg22, responses, including, gene, 'induction,', growth, 'arrest,', and, plasma, membrane, relacion([sujeto(['These', kinase, alterations, include]), verbo([activating]), complemento([mutations, in, 'A-Raf', 'proto-oncogene,', 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, 1, ',', macular, 'changes,', and, 'bull\'s-eye', lesions])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([clinically, characterized, a, large, 'four-generation', family, with, 'COD1', and, have, performed, a, linkage, analysis, using, seven, polymorphic, markers, on, the, short, arm, of, the, 'X', chromosome])]). relacion([sujeto(['No', recombination, was, observed, between, the, disease, and, the, marker, loci, 'DXS7', and, 'MAOA,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, location, of, 'COD1', is, in, the, region, 'Xp11'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', genes, 'ARAF1,', 'SYN1,', 'TIMP,', and, 'PFC', are, clustered, within, 70, kb, of, one, 'another,', 'and,', as]), verbo([reported]), complemento([in, the, accompanying, paper, '(', 'J'])]). relacion([sujeto([23, :, at, least, three, eye, diseases, '(', retinitis, pigmentosa, type, 2, ',', congenital, stationary, night, blindness, 'CSNB1,', and, 'Aland', 'Island', eye, 'disease),', 'Wiskott-Aldrich', 'syndrome,', 'X-linked', 'nephrolithiasis,', and, a, translocation, breakpoint]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, synovial, sarcoma])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([constructed, a, 1.8, -, 'Mb', 'YAC', contig, in, this, 'region,', confirming, the, link, between, 'TIMP', and, 'OATL1', reported, by, 'Knight', et, al])]). 'YAC)', 'clones,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([generated, a, physical, map, of, the, short, arm, of, the, human, 'X', chromosome, at, 'Xp11'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), using, fragmentation, vectors, to, generate, 'YAC', deletion, derivatives])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together', these, data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, following, order, for, the, markers, in, complemento([survival, of, cells, and, maintain, normal, insulin, functions])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, study, we, investigated, the, effect, of, a, 'β-adrenergic', receptor, agonist, and,
