verbo([provide]), complemento([the, essential, framework, for, the, development, and, testing, of, new, specific, targeted, therapies, for, particular, glioma, subtypes])]). relacion([sujeto(['CIMP-P1', showed, female, 'predominance,', proximal, 'location,', advanced, 'TNM', 'stage,', mild]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([of, 'CK20', and, 'CDX2', 'expression,', mild, increase, of, 'CK7', 'expression,', 'BRAF', 'mutation,', 'MSI', and, 'MLH1', methylation])]). relacion([sujeto(['ATRX', and, 'TERT', mutations]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([the, importance, of, telomere, maintenance, in, gliomagenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Over', the, past, 'decade,', a, remarkable, accumulation, of, knowledge, from, the, genomic, study, of, gliomas]), verbo([has]), complemento([led, to, reclassification, of, 'tumors,', new, understanding, of, oncogenic, 'mechanisms,', and, novel, treatment, strategies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Since', the, prior, 'edition,', sinonasal, origin, is, now]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, the, most, common, site, of, occurrence, of, mucosal, melanoma, in, the, head, and, neck, '(', 66, '%', ')', with, oral, cavity, representing, 25, '%', of, cases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Additionally,', mucosal, melanomas, are, commonly, amelanotic, '(', or, minimal, 'pigmentation)', '(', '~50%)']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, overlapping, features, and, diagnostic, challenges, in, differentiating, mucosal, melanomas, from, other, small, 'cell/undifferentiated', sinonasal, tumors])]). the, traditional, histologic, features, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([prognostic, significance, in, cutaneous, melanomas, fail, to, stratify, mucosal, melanomas, '(', i])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', while, melanomas, of, all, sites, are, a, malignancy, derived, from, 'melanocytes,', mucosal, melanomas, are, now]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([to, have, distinct, molecular, alterations, compared, to, cutaneous, or, uveal, melanomas])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', recognition, of, the, distinct, genetic, changes, in, this, subgroup, of, melanomas, resistant, mutations, in, the, tyrosine, kinase, domain, of, specific, oncogenes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, epithelial, growth, factor, receptor, mutations, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Frequent', coexistence, of, gene, mutations, in, pairs, and, triplets]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, synergistic, effect, of, overlapping, mutations, might, further, trigger, the, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['Immune', checkpoint, inhibitors, and]), verbo([targeted]), complemento(['therapies,', two, new, class, of, drugs, for, treatment, of, metastatic, 'melanoma,', have, not, been, compared, in, randomized, controlled, trials, '(', 'RCT)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', quantitatively, summarized, the, evidence, and, compared, immune, and]), 'PFS', as, compared, to, 'anti-CTLA4', '(', 'HR:', 0.22, ;, 95, '%', confidence, interval, '[', 'CI]:', 0.12, -, 0.41, ')', and, 'anti-PD1', antibodies, alone, '(', 'HR:', 0.38, ;, 'CI:', 0.2, -, 0.72, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', 'anti-PD1', monoclonal, antibodies, were, less, toxic, than, 'anti-CTLA4', monoclonal, antibodies, '(', 'RR:', 0.65, ;, 'CI:', 0.4, -, 0.78, ')', and, their, combination, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([toxicity, compared, to, either, single, agent, 'anti-CTLA4', '(', 'RR:', 2.06, ;, 'CI:', 1.45, -, 2.93, ')', or, 'anti-PD1', targeted, therapies, is, the, most, effective, 'strategy,', whereas, single, agent, 'anti-PD1', antibodies, have, the, best, acceptability])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further', research, is, needed, to]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, quality, of, evidence])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'DAB', inhibited, 'LPS-induced', barrier, 'disruption,', expression, of, complemento(['LPS-induced', hyperpermeability, and, leukocytes, migration, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'DAB']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, production, of, tumor, necrosis, 'factor-α', '(', 'TNF-α)', or, 'Interleukin', '(', 'IL)-6', and, the, activation, of, nuclear, 'factor-κB', '(', 'NF-κB)', or, extracellular, regulated, kinases, '(', 'ERK)', 1, /, 2, by, 'LPS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'DAB', possesses, 'anti-inflammatory', functions, by, inhibiting, 'hyperpermeability,', expression, of, 'CAMs,', and, adhesion, and, migration, of, 'leukocytes,', thereby, endorsing, its, usefulness, as, a, therapy, for, vascular, inflammatory, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Studies', focused, on, the, killing, of]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['B-RAF', melanoma, cells, by, the, histone, deacetylase, '(', 'HDAC)', inhibitor, 'AR42'])]). relacion([sujeto(['AR42', and, the, 'multi-kinase', inhibitor, pazopanib]), verbo([interacted]), complemento([to, 'activate:', an, 'eIF2α-Beclin1', pathway, causing, autophagosome, 'formation;', an, 'eIF2α-DR4/DR5/CD95', 'pathway;', and, an, 'eIF2α-dependent', reduction, in, the, expression, of, 'c-FLIP-s,', 'MCL-1', and, 'BCL-XL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['AR42', did, not, alter, basal, chaperone, activity, but]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, ability, of, pazopanib, to, inhibit, 'HSP90,', 'HSP70', and, 'GRP78'])]). relacion([sujeto(['AR42', and, pazopanib]), verbo([caused]), complemento(['HSP90/HSP70', dissociation, from, 'RAF-1', and, 'B-RAF', that, resulted, in, reduced, '\'', 'RAF\'', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', drug, combination]), verbo([activated]), complemento([a, 'DNA-damage-ATM-AMPK', pathway, that, was, associated, 'with:', 'NFκB', 'activation;', reduced, mTOR, 'S2448', and, 'ULK-1', 'S757', 'phosphorylation;', and, increased, 'ULK-1', 'S317', and, 'ATG13', 'S318', phosphorylation])]). verbo([enhanced]), complemento([survival, from, '~25', to, '~40', days])]). relacion([sujeto(['Tumor', cells, that, had, adapted, through, therapy, exhibited, elevated, 'HGF', expression, and, the, of, oral, mucosa, shares, some, clinical, features, with, its, cutaneous, 'counterpart,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, a, worst, 'prognosis;', its, etiopathogenesis, are, verbo([mediates]), complemento([cellular, responses, to, growth, signals, and, its, activation, is, an, important, phenomenon, in, melanoma])]). relacion([sujeto(['Point', mutations, of, 'NRAS', '(', hadrontherapy, biological, properties, seem, able, to]), verbo([suppress]), complemento(['hypoxia-induced', radioresistance, and, increase, biological, 'efficacy,', ballistic, advantages, over, mutant, '(', 'BRAF(V600E))', inhibitor, 'vemurafenib,']), verbo([has]), complemento([improved, clinical, outcomes, for, patients, with, 'BRAF(V600E)', 'melanoma,', but, acquired, cellular, resistance, several, cellular, processes, such, as, 'growth,', 'survival,', 'differentiation,', and, cellular, transformation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([used, quantitative, in, the, activation, loop, which, is, '~5fold']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([in, 'BRAF', 'V600E'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutation', of, 'S614']), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, kinase, this, site, is, 'inhibitory,', and, part, of, the, physiological, 'shut-down', mechanism, of, 'BRAF', signalling])]). relacion([sujeto(['All', imaging, parameters, showed, a, significant, biomarker, of, early, tumor, response, to, 'anti-proliferative', 'treatment,', with, static, imaging, not, being, inferior, to, full, compartmental, analysis, in, our, xenograft, model])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', discordant, rate, was, significantly, higher, in, lymph, node, 'metastases/primary', tumor, pairs, '(', 74.6, '%', ')', than, in, distant, 'metastases/primary', tumor, pairs, '(', 52.4, '%', ')', or, lymph, node, 'metastases/distant', metastases, pairs, '(', 51.6, '%', ')', '(', p, =, 0.0113, and, p, =, 0.0261, ')', with, more]), verbo([gain]), complemento(['(', 86.7, '%', ')', than, loss, '(', 61.1, '%', ')', of, microsatellite, instability, in, the, discordant, lymph, node, metastases, '(', p, =, 0.0024, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Displacement', loop, instability, occurred, significantly, more, frequently, in, lymph, node, metastases, and, distant, metastases, of, patients, with, early, colorectal, cancer, onset, age, &, 'lt;60', years, '(', p, =, 0.0122, and, p, =, 0.0129, ')', ',', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([with, a, significant, high, rate, in, a, small, cohort, of, 'TP53-mutated', distant, metastases, '(', p, =, 0.0418, ')', ',', and, was, associated, with, 'TP53', 'wild-type', status, of, primary, tumors, '(', p, =, 0.0009, ')', ',', but, did, not, correlate, with, 'KRAS,', 'NRAS,', 'BRAF,', or, 'PIK3CA', mutations])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', mitochondrial, microsatellite, instability, and, its, association, with, selected, clinical, and, molecular, markers, are, discordant, in, primary, and, verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, during, treatment, with, 'vemurafenib,', including, multiple, benign, lesions, 'and,', less, 'frequently,', atypical, melanocytic, proliferations, and, 'cancer-related', alterations, in, 'DNA', methylation, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([transcription, have, been, reported, for, a, variety, of, tumors, of, the, gastrointestinal, tract])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, 'data-driven,', 'pan-gastrointestinal', stratification, of, individual, samples, based, on, 'CIMP', status, and, we, investigate, accounts, for, approximately, 1, to, 5, '%', of, all, 'cancers,', but, is, currently, among, the, top, six]), verbo([causes]), complemento([of, cancer, deaths, in, 'Western', countries])]). relacion([sujeto(['At', 'progression,', 're-biopsy', might, be, necessary, to]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, true, origin, of, the, tumor, or, actionable, targets])]). relacion([sujeto(['Re-biopsy', of, cancer, of, unknown, primary, site, at, progression, can]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, true, cellular, origin, of, the, tumor, as, well, as, provide, novel, therapeutic, 'opportunities,', including, immunotherapy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nivolumab']), verbo([has]), complemento([demonstrated, promising, 'anti-cancer', activity, in, various, cancers])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', advances, in]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([anticancer, therapies, have, substantially, improved, the, prognosis, of, several, cancers])]). relacion([sujeto(['Such']), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapies, are, 'not,', 'however,', free, of, side, 'effects,', and, these, side, effects, are, clearly, distinct, from, those, induced, by, classical, cytotoxic, chemotherapies])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', is, likely, so, because]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapies, are, designed, to, interfere, with, specific, oncogenic, signaling, pathways, rather, than, to, inhibit, cell, proliferation, in, general])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'fact,', interference, with, specific, signaling, pathways, may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, effects, that, mimic, those, associated, with, genetic, disorders, due, to, alterations, in, the, corresponding, signaling, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, compare, the, clinical, effects, of, treatment, with, 'BRAF', inhibitors, with, those, of, genetic, 'RASopathies', and]), verbo([find]), complemento([a, striking, overlap, between, the, 'inhibitor-induced,', iatrogenic, dermatoses, with, the, genodermatoses, seen, in, patients, with, corresponding, congenital, 'RASopathies'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', hope, that, such, comparisons]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, a, better, understanding, of, the, side, effects, of, targeted, therapies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Genetic', lesions, such, as, 'JAK2', mutations, and, 'BCR-ABL', translocation, are, often, mutually, exclusive, in, 'MPN', patients, and]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, essential, 'thrombocythemia,', polycythemia, vera, or, myelofibrosis, '(', 'ET/PV/MF)', or, chronic, myeloid, 'leukemia,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nevertheless,', coexistence, of, these, genetic, aberrations, in, the, same, patient]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), kinase, '(', 'ALK)', 'gene,', have, been, identified, in, 1, -, 5, '%', of, lung, 'cancers,', suggesting, that, similar, rare, gene, fusions, may, occur, in, other, common, epithelial, 'cancers,', sensitive, to, 'RAF', and, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, '(', 'MAP2K1)', inhibitors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Screening', a, large, cohort, of, 'patients,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento(['that,', although, 'rare,', recurrent, rearrangements, in, the, 'RAF', pathway, tend, to, occur, in, advanced, prostate, 'cancers,', gastric, cancers, and, melanoma])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results, emphasize, the, key, role, of, 'RAF', family, gene, rearrangements, in, 'cancer,']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'RAF', and, 'MEK', an, increased, spontaneous, and, 'Fas-induced', apoptosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', inhibition, of, heat, shock, protein, 90, '(', 'Hsp90)']), verbo([has]), complemento([emerged, as, a, promising, 'DLBCLs']), verbo([has]), complemento([identified, frequent, 'BCL2', mutations, clustered, in, the, exons, coding, for, the, 'BH4', domain, and, the, folded, loop, domain, '(', 'FLD)', of, the, protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', effects, of, mutations, are, mainly, determined, by, the, ability, of, the, mutated, 'BCL2', to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([apoptosis, by, this, 'inter-member', protein, binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nevertheless,', 'BCL2']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([diverse, 'non-canonical', pathways, that, are, unlikely, to, be, explained, by, canonical, interactions])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'review,', 'first,', we, identify, recurrent, missense, mutations, in, the, 'BH4', domain, and, the, 'FLD']), verbo([reported]), complemento([in, independent, lymphoma, sequencing, studies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Second,', we, discuss, the, probable, consequences, of, mutations, on, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([ability, of, 'BCL2', to, 'non-BCL2', family, member, proteins, crucial, for, 1, ')', maintaining, mitochondrial, energetics, and, calcium, hemostasis, such, as, 'VDAC,', 'IP3R,', and, 'RyR', and, 2, ')', oncogenic, pathways, implicated, in, the, acquisition, of, the, '\'', hallmarks, of, 'cancer\'', such, as, 'SOD,', 'Raf-1,', 'NFAT,', 'p53,', 'HIF-1α,', and, gelsolin])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', study, also, highlights, the, likely, ramifications, of, mutations, on]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'BCL2', antagonists, and, 'BH3', profiling])]). relacion([sujeto(['Based', on, our, 'analysis,', we, believe, that, an, 'in-depth', focus, on, 'BCL2', interactions]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, these, domains, is, warranted, to, elucidate, the, functional, significance, of, missense, mutations, in, 'DLBCL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'summary,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, extensive, overview, of, the, pleiotropic, functions, of, 'BCL2', mediated, by, its, physical, binding, interaction, with, other, proteins, and, the, various, ways, 'BCL2', mutations, would, affect, the, normal, function, of, the, cell, leading, to, the, development, of, 'DLBCL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Silodosin,', a, selective, 'α1A-adrenergic', blocker, prescribed, for, the, symptomatic, treatment, of, benign, prostatic, 'hyperplasia,', was, previously, shown, to]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'ELK1,', a, 'c-fos', 'proto-oncogene', regulator, and, a, 'well-described', downstream, target, of, the, 'PKC/Raf-1/ERK', 'pathway,', in, human, prostate, smooth, muscle, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['PKC/Raf-1/ERK', activation]), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, implicated, in, drug, resistance])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', silodosin, alone, '(', up, to, 10, 'μM)', insignificantly, affected, the, growth, of, bladder, cancer, cells, cultured, in, androgen, depleted, conditions, or, those]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['ELK1-short', hairpin, 'RNA,', it, considerably, inhibited, the, viability, of, androgen, receptor, '(', 'AR)-positive/ELK1-positive', cells, in, the, presence, of, androgens])]). relacion([sujeto(['Silodosin', also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, migration, of, 'ELK1-positive', cells, with, or, without, a, functional, 'AR,', but, not, that, of, 'ELK1', knockdown, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', silodosin, treatment, or, 'ELK1', silencing, resulted, in]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, drug, sensitivity, to, 'cisplatin,', but, not, to, 'gemcitabine,', even, in, 'AR-negative', cells, or, 'AR-positive', cells, cultured, in, an, 'androgen-depleted', condition])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', silodosin]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'NF-κB,', a, key, regulator, of, 'chemoresistance,', and, its, transcriptional, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Silodosin', was, thus]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, not, only, inhibit, cell, viability, and, migration, but, also, enhance, the, cytotoxic, activity, of, cisplatin, in, bladder, cancer, lines, via, inactivating, 'ELK1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, combined, treatment, with, silodosin, is, useful, for, overcoming, chemoresistance, in, patients, with, 'ELK1-positive', urothelial, carcinoma, receiving, cisplatin])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mitogen-activated', protein, kinases]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([various, intracellular, processes, such, as, cell, 'differentiation,', 'survival,', and, death])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hepatic', ischemia, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([in, mice, by, occlusion, of, the, hepatic, 'artery,', portal, 'vein,', and, bile, duct])]). relacion([sujeto(['Melatonin', treatment, attenuated, hepatic, 'I/R-induced']), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, alanine, aminotransferase, and, aspartate, complemento([that, melatonin, protects, hepatic, cells, against, hepatic, 'I/R', damage, through, the, activation, of, the, 'Raf-MEK-ERK', cascade, and, phosphorylation, of, its, downstream, targets])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', number, of, molecular]), verbo([targets]), complemento([have, been, studied, over, the, last, decade, leading, to, several, phase, 'II', 'studies;', 'however,', very, few, agents, progressed, to, phase, 'III', clinical, trials])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'RAF', family, of, proteins, belongs, to, the, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', and, 'RAF-1', activation]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, inhibit, tumor, growth, in, a, 'pre-clinical', setting])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we]), important]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, therapeutic, drug, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['Canonically,', 'AR', signals, through, a, genomic, or, transcriptional, 'pathway,']), '(', 'PI3K)/Akt', and, protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC),', which, in, turn, converge, on, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)/extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK)', 'non-genomic', 'AR', signaling, may, enhance, 'AR', genomic, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Non-genomic', 'AR', signaling, may, occur, in, an, 'ERK-independent', 'manner,', via, activation, of, mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', 'pathway,', or, modulation, of, intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', concentration, through, plasma, membrane, 'G', 'protein-coupled', 'MEK,', 'ERK1/2,', and, 'RSK'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'YB-1']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, 'ERK2', and, 'Raf-1', and, regulated, their, 'expressions,', through, the, diagnosis, and, therapeutics])]). relacion([sujeto(['Excessive', alcohol, consumption, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, most, cases, of, chronic, 'pancreatitis,', a, progressive, necrotizing, inflammatory, disease, that, can, result, in, pancreatic, insufficiency, due, to, acinar, atrophy, and, fibrosis, and, an, increased, risk, of, pancreatic, cancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['At', a, cellular, level, acute, alcohol, exposure, can, sensitize, pancreatic, acinar, cells, to, secretagogue, 'stimulation,', resulting, in, dysregulation, of, intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', homeostasis, and, premature, digestive, enzyme, 'activation;', 'however,', the, molecular, mechanisms, by, which, ethanol, exerts, these, toxic, effects]), verbo([have]), complemento([remained, undefined])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, exposure, of, rodent, acinar, cells, to, ethanol]), verbo([induces]), complemento([protein, kinase, 'C-dependent', 'Raf-1', hairpin, 'RNA', or, gene, ablation]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, sensitizing, effects, of, ethanol, on, 'cholecystokinin-', and, 'carbachol-stimulated', 'Ca(2+)', signaling, and, the, prevention, or, treatment, of, 'alcohol-associated', pancreatitis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Glioma', cells, with, stem, cell, 'properties,', termed, glioma, 'stem-like', cells, '(', 'GSCs),']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, linked, to, tumor, 'formation,', 'maintenance,', and, progression, and, are, responsible, for, the, failure, of, chemotherapy, and, radiotherapy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Compounds', that]), verbo([target]), complemento(['GSCs', might, be, helpful, in, overcoming, resistance, to, anticancer, treatments, in, human, brain, tumors])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, showed, that, 5, -, 'bromo-3-(3-hydroxyprop-1-ynyl)-2H-pyran-2-one', '(', 'BHP),', a, new, 2, -, pyrone, 'derivative,']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, maintenance, of, the, 'GSC', population, in, both, a, glioma, cell, line, and, 'patient-derived', glioma, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'GSCs', with, 'BHP', effectively]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([sphere, formation, and, suppressed, the, 'CD133(+)', cell, population])]). relacion([sujeto(['Treatment', with, 'BHP', also]), verbo([suppressed]), 'GSCs', with, 'BHP', significantly]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([two, fundamental, characteristics, of, cancer, stem, 'cells:', 'self-renewal', and, tumorigenicity])]). relacion([sujeto(['BHP', treatment, dramatically]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['clone-forming', ability, at, the, 'single-cell', level, and, suppressed, in, vivo, tumor, formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['BHP', markedly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([both, phosphoinositide, 3, -, 'kinase/Akt', and, 'Ras/Raf-1/extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, 'signaling,', which, suggests, that, one, or, both, of, these, pathways, are, involved, in, 'BHP-induced', suppression, of, 'GSCs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results, indicate, that, 'BHP']), verbo([targets]), complemento(['GSCs', and, enhances, their, sensitivity, to, anticancer, treatments, and, suggest, that, 'BHP', treatment, may, be, useful, for, treating, brain, tumors, by, eliminating, 'GSCs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', evaluate, the, mechanism, by, which, 'Raf-1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([cytoskeleton, reorganization, and, 'motility,', we, used, primary, eutopic, '(', 'Eu-,', n, =, 16, ')', and, ectopic, '(', 'Ec-,', n, =, 8, ;, isolated, from, ovarian, 'cysts)', hESC, of, patients, with, endometriosis, and, 'endometriosis-free', controls, '(', 'Co-hESC,', n, =, 14, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Raf-1', siRNA, knockdown, in, 'Co-', and, 'Eu-hESC', resulted, in, contraction, and]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([migration, versus, siRNA, controls])]). relacion([sujeto(['Lowest', 'Raf-1', levels, in, 'Ec-hESC', were]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, hyperactivated, 'ROCKII', and, 'ezrin/radixin/moesin', '(', 'E/R/M),', impaired, migration, and, a, contracted, phenotype, similar, to, 'Raf-1', knockdown, in, 'Co-', and, 'Eu-hESC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', further, show, that, the, mechanism, by, which, 'Raf-1']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([migration, in, hESC, includes, direct, myosin, light, chain, phosphatase, '(', 'MYPT1)', phosphorylation, and, regulation, of, the, levels, of, 'E/R/M,', 'paxillin,', 'MYPT1', and, contrast, to, 'Co-and', 'Eu-hESC,', where, the, cellular, 'Raf-1', levels, regulate, the, rate, of, 'migration,', the, low, cellular, 'Raf-1', content, in, 'Ec-hESC,', might, ensure, their, restricted, migration, by, preserving, the, contracted, cellular, phenotype])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, cellular, levels, of, 'Raf-1', adjust, the, threshold, of, hESC, migration, in, endometriosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, a, variety, of, proteins, that, play, key, roles, in, breast, neoplasia, including, estrogen, 'receptors,', tumor, suppressor, p53, 'protein,', angiogenesis, transcription, factor, 'HIF-1alpha,', antiapoptotic, kinase, 'Akt,', 'Raf-1', 'MAP', kinase, and, a, variety, of, receptor, tyrosine, kinases, of, the, erbB, family])]). relacion([sujeto(['Elevated', 'Hsp90', expression]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, documented, in, breast, ductal, carcinomas, contributing, to, the, proliferative, activity, of, breast, cancer, 'cells;', whilst, a, significantly, decreased, 'Hsp90', expression, has, been, shown, in, infiltrative, lobular, carcinomas, and, lobular, neoplasia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hsp90', overexpression]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, proposed, as, a, component, of, a, mechanism, through, which, breast, cancer, cells, become, resistant, to, various, stress, stimuli])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', pharmacological, inhibition, of, 'HSPs', can]), verbo([provide]), complemento([therapeutic, opportunities, in, the, field, of, cancer, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto([17, -, 'allylamino,17-demethoxygeldanamycin', is, the, first, 'Hsp90', inhibitor, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([clinically, been, investigated, in, phase, 'II', 'trial,', yielding, promising, results, in, patients, with, 'HER2-overexpressing', metastatic, breast, 'cancer,', whilst, other, 'Hsp90', inhibitors, '(', retaspimycin, observed, in, 'glioblastoma,', but, the, glioblastoma, microenvironment, may, be, conditioned, to, resist, antitumor, immune, responses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Glioblastoma-conditioned', media]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['LC', 'differentiation,', resulting, in, functional, 'impairment,', as, determined, by, allogeneic, mixed, leukocyte, 'reactivity,', and, induction, of, 'STAT3', activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', neither, addition, of, 'JSI-124', '(', 'cucurbitacin-I;', a, 'JAK2/STAT3', 'inhibitor),', nor, of, 'GW5074', '(', a, 'Raf-1', 'inhibitor),', both, of, which, interfere, with, signaling, pathways]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, act, downstream, of, the, 'IL-6', 'receptor,', prevented, the, observed, inhibitory, effects, on, 'LC', differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 14, -, 3, -, 3, family, of, 'phosphoserine/threonine-recognition', proteins, engage, multiple, nodes, in, signaling, networks, that, control, diverse, physiological, and, pathophysiological, functions, and]), verbo([have]), complemento([emerged, as, promising, therapeutic, targets, for, such, diseases, as, cancer, and, neurodegenerative, disorders])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', analyze, 14, -, 3, -, 3, function, and]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([its, 'activity,', we, conducted, a, chemical, screen, and, identified, 4, -, '[', '(', 2, 'Z)-2-[4-formyl-6-methyl-5-oxo-3-(phosphonatooxymethyl)pyridin-2-ylidene]hydrazinyl]benzoate', as, a, 14, -, 3, -, 3, 'inhibitor,', which, we, termed, 'FOBISIN', '(', 'FOurteen-three-three', 'BInding', 'Small', molecule, 'INhibitor)', 101])]). relacion([sujeto(['FOBISIN101', effectively, blocked, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, with, 'Raf-1', and, 'proline-rich', 'AKT', 'substrate,', 40, 'kD(a)', and, neutralized, the, ability, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, to, activate, exoenzyme, 'S', 'ADP-ribosyltransferase'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To']), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, mechanistic, basis, for, 14, -, 3, -, 3, 'inhibition,', the, crystal, structure, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ζ, in, complex, with, 'FOBISIN101', was, solved])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', the, double, bond, linking, the, 'pyridoxal-phosphate', and, benzoate, moieties, was, reduced, by, 'X-rays', to, create, a, covalent, linkage, of, the, 'pyridoxal-phosphate', moiety, to, lysine, 120, in, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([groove, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ',', leading, to, persistent, 14, -, 3, -, 3, inactivation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'FOBISIN101-like', molecules, could, be, developed, as, an, entirely, unique, class, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, 'inhibitors,', which, may, serve, as, 'radiation-triggered', therapeutic, agents, for, the, treatment, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, -, mediated, 'diseases,', such, as, cancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['Novel', functions, of, signaling, molecules]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, revealed, in, studies, of, cancer, stem, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['RA', treatment, of, 'HL-60', cells]), verbo([causes]), complemento([unusually, 'long-lasting', 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, 'signaling,', with, the, cells, exhibiting, the, beginning, of, 'G0', cell, cycle, arrest, and, functional, differentiation, by, 48, h, after, treatment, with, 'RA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', event, coincides, with, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, 'Raf-1,', phosphorylated, at, serine, 621])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', present, study, shows, how, the, novel, localization, of, 'Raf-1', to, the, nucleus, results, in, transcriptional, changes, that, contribute, to, the, differentiation, of, 'HL-60', cells]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'RA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, nuclear, pS621, 'Raf-1', associates, with, 'NFATc3', near, its, cognate, binding, site, in, the, promoter, of, 'CXCR5,', a, gene, that, must, be, 'up-regulated', to, drive, 'RA-induced', differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Inhibiting', the, pS621, 'Raf-1/NFATc3', association, with, 'PD98059']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([these, processes, and, cripples, 'RA-induced', differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, novel, paradigm, for, 'Raf-1', and, 'RA', 'function,', 'Raf-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, role, in, driving, the, nuclear, signaling, of, 'RA-induced', differentiation, of, leukemic, progenitor, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['KLF10', is, now, classified, as, a, member, of, the, 'Krüppel-like', transcription, factor, family, and]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, tumor, suppressor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', 'KLF10', is, originally, named, as, 'TGF-β-inducible', early, 'gene-1', and, mimicking, the, 'anti-proliferative', effect, of, 'TGF-β', in, various, carcinoma, 'cells,', the, transcriptional, upregulatory, function, of, 'KLF10']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, described, for, a, variety, of, cytokines, and, in, many, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Through', in, vivo, and, in, vitro, phosphorylation, 'assays,', we, identified, that, 'KLF10', is, a]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento([protein, in, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', 'yeast-two', hybrid, screening, and, site, direct, 'mutagenesis,', we, also, identified, 'PIN1', as, a, novel, 'KLF10']), verbo([associated]), complemento([protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['PIN1', is, a, 'peptidyl-prolyl', isomerase, enzyme, belonging, to, the, parvulin, 'family,', which, specifically]), verbo([recognizes]), complemento([phosphorylated, 'Ser/Thr-Pro', containing, substrates])]). relacion([sujeto(['More', 'importantly,', 'PIN1']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'KLF10', in, a, 'phosphorylation-dependent', manner, and, this, interaction, promotes, 'KLF10', protein, degradation, in, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', 'KLF10', shows, shorter, protein, stability, compared, with, mutant, 'KLF10', that, lacks, 'PIN1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([ability, after, cycloheximide, treatments])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', in, vitro, kinase, assays, and, depletion, 'assays,', we, were, able, to, show, that, 'RAF-1']), verbo([phosphorylates]), complemento([the, 'Thr-93', of, 'KLF10', and, affects, the, 'KLF10', expression, level, in, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus', these, findings, as, a, whole, indicate, that, 'RAF-1', phosphorylation, and, 'PIN1', isomerization, together]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['KLF10', stability, and, further, affect, the, role, of, 'KLF10', in, tumor, progression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Raf', kinases, are, essential, for]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cell, 'proliferation,', 'survival,', and, tumorigenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms, by, which, 'Raf', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([are, still, incompletely, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, mutation, of, 'Lys375', to, 'Met', diminishes, phosphorylation, of, 'Ser338', on, both, wild, type, 'Raf-1', in, cells, treated, with, epidermal, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF)', or, 12, -, 'O-tetradecanoylphorbol-13-acetate', '(', 'TPA)', and, a, constitutively, active, mutant, in, which, 'Tyr340/Tyr341', are, replaced, by, 2, aspartic, 'acids,', a, conserved, substitution, present, in, natural, 'B-Raf'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'Ser338', phosphorylation, in, these, 'Raf', mutants, is, not, engendered, by, a, 'mutation-induced', conformational, 'change,', inasmuch, as, mutation, of, another, site, '(', 'Ser471', to, 'Ala)', in, the, activation, segment, also, abolishes, 'Ser338', 'phosphorylation,', whereas, both, the, 'kinase-dead', mutants, of, 'Raf-1', are, phosphorylated, well, by, active, 'Pak1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', our, data, demonstrate, that, 'EGF-stimulated', phosphorylation, of, 'Ser338', is]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'Sorafenib,', a, 'Raf', kinase, 'inhibitor,', but, not, by, the, 'MEK', inhibitor, 'U0126'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', our, data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'phosphorylation,', accompanied, by, activation, of, 'ERK1/2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Altogether,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Ser338', on, 'Raf-1', is, autophosphorylated, in, response, to, mitogens])]). relacion([sujeto(['Raf-1', is, an, important, effector, of, 'Ras']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([signaling, and, is, a, critical, regulator, of, the, 'ERK/MAPK', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previously', 'PAK1', and, casein, kinase, 'II']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, implicated, as, serine, 338, kinases])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', identify, novel, kinases, that]), verbo([phosphorylate]), complemento([this, 'site,', we, tested, the, ability, of, group, 'II', 'PAKs', '(', 'PAKs', 4, -, 6, ')', to, control, serine, 338, phosphorylation])]). complemento(['Raf-1', kinase, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Importantly,', we, also, demonstrated, that, the, association, of, 'Raf-1', with, 'PAK5']), verbo([targets]), complemento([a, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'PI3K', with, either, 'LY294002', and, wortmannin, was, sufficient, to]), verbo([cause]), complemento([upregulation, of, 'ERK', activity, as, measured, by, relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, molecular, signaling, pathway, induced, by, the, 'C-type', lectin, 'DC-SIGN', that, modulates, 'TLR', signaling, at, the, of, adaptive, immunity, by, 'DCs', to, 'bacterial,', 'fungal,', and, viral, pathogens])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activation', of, 'Raf-1', by, 'Ras']), verbo([requires]), complemento([recruitment, to, of, 'Rap1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', propose, that, this, is, because, 'Raf-1', is, not]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento([on, 'Tyr-341', upon, recruitment, to, 'Rap1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', contrast, to, 'Raf-1,', 'B-Raf', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'Rap1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, this, is, because, verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'Rap1'])]). relacion([sujeto([14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, are, a, family, of]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([dimeric, molecules, that, interact, with, a, broad, range, of, target, 'proteins,', most, of, which, contain, 'phosphoserine/threonine'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', amphipathic, groove, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, is, the, main, structural, feature]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, mediating, its, associations])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([studied, another, domain, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ',', the, 'C-terminal', may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, mechanism, by, which, inappropriate, associations, with, 14, -, 3, -, 3, are, prevented])]). relacion([sujeto([14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, belong, to, a, family, of]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['molecules,', which, play, a, regulatory, role, and, participate, in, signal, transduction, and, checkpoint, control, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto([14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['phosphoserine-phosphorylated', 'ligands,', such, as, the, 'Raf-1', kinase, and, 'Bad,', through, recognition, of, the, phosphorylated, consensus, between, 14, -, 3, -, 3, and, a, small, number, of, 'proteins,', for, example, the, 43, kDa, inositol, polyphosphate, 5, -, 'phosphatase,', glycoprotein, 'Ib,', 'p75NTR-associated', 'cell-death', both, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['Loss', of, the, 14, -, 3, -, 3, -]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, on, 'ExoS', results, in, an, 'ExoS', molecule, that, is, unable, to, relacion([sujeto(['Both', 'TNF-alpha', and, 'cell-permeable', ceramide]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, increase, the, kinase, activity, of, kinase, suppressor, of, 'Ras', '(', complemento([by, 'PKA,', while, 'ERK2', and, 'MEK', were, not])]). relacion([sujeto(['Phosphopeptide', mapping, identified, 'Ser-43', of, 'Raf-1', as, the, only, site]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento([by, 'PKA', in, the, 'Ras/MAPK', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activation', of, the, kinase, domain, occurs, following]), verbo([release]), complemento([from, the, 'N-terminal', 'CR3[YY340/341DD]', from, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ',', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, substantially, reduce, catalytic, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', the, presence, of, serine, 621, in, the, free, catalytic, fragment, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, full, 'CR3', activation, by, stimulatory, 'factors,', and, the, continuous, presence, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, at, this, site, both, signal, transduction, and, checkpoint, control, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto([14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins]), verbo([bind]), complemento([phosphoserine, 'ligands,', such, as, 'Raf-1', kinase, and, 'phosphoserine\')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', 14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, must]), verbo([bind]), complemento([unphosphorylated, 'ligands,', such, as, glycoprotein, 'Ibalpha', and, 'Pseudomonas', aeruginosa, exoenzyme, 'S', '(', 'ExoS),', since, it, has, been, suggested, that, specific, residues, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, are, required, for, activation, of, 'ExoS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', an, unphosphorylated, peptide, derived, from, a, phage, display, library]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, binding, of, both, 'ExoS', and, 'Raf-1', to, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ',', and, bound, within, the, same, conserved, amphipathic, groove, on, the, surface, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, as, the, 'Raf-derived', phosphopeptide, '(', 'pS-Raf-259)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, study, we, identify, the, interaction, site, on, 'ExoS', for, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ',', and, show, that, 'ExoS', and, 14, -, 3, -, 3, do, indeed]), verbo([interact]), complemento([in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['Loss', of, the, 14, -, 3, -, 3]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, on, 'ExoS', results, in, an, 'ExoS', molecule, that, is, unable, to, efficiently, inactivate, 'Ras,', and, displays, reduced, killing, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Full', activation, of, 'Raf-1']), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, interaction, of, its, 'CRD', with, 'Ras'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'CRD', loses, its, 'Ras-binding', activity, when]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, connection, with, 'CR2,', suggesting, that, 'CR2', masks, 'CRD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'COS-7', cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['Ha-Ras(Val-12)', and, 'Raf-1', with, 'TPA', enhances, the, 'Ha-Ras(Val-12)-dependent', 'Raf-1', kinase, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, 'Ha-Ras(Val-12)-dependent', activities, of, the, 'Raf-1(S259D)', and, 'Raf-1(S259A)', mutants, are, comparable, to, that, of, 'wild-type', 'Raf-1']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, both, 'Ha-Ras(Val-12)', and, 'TPA', and, cannot, be, further, stimulated, by, 'TPA', treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, in, vivo, phosphorylation, of, 'Ser-259', may, comprise, a, crucial, step, for, 'Ras-dependent', 'Raf-1', activation, by, unmasking, 'CRD', and, promoting, its, association, with, 'Ras'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', number, of, 'Raf-associated', proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, been, 'identified,', including, members, of, the, 14, -, 3, -, 3, family, of, 'phosphoserine-binding', proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', both, positive, and, negative, regulatory, functions]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, ascribed, for, 14, -, 3, -, 3, interactions, with, 'Raf-1,', the, mechanisms, by, which, 14, -, 3, -, 3, binding, modulates, 'Raf', activity, have, not, been, fully, established])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, mutational, disruption, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, binding, to, the, 'B-Raf', catalytic, domain, inhibits, 'B-Raf', biological, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, the, isolated, 'B-Raf', catalytic, domain, '(', 'B-Rafcat)']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['PC12', cell, differentiation, in, the, absence, of, nerve, growth, factor])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', 'contrast,', the, 'B-Rafcat', 14, -, 3, -, 3]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['mutant,', 'B-Rafcat', 'S728A,', was, severely, compromised, for, the, induction, of, 'PC12', cell, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', the, 'B-Rafcat', 14, -, 3, -, 3]), verbo([binding]), complemento([mutant, retained, significant, in, vitro, catalytic, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'Xenopus', 'oocytes,', the, analogous, 'full-length', 'B-Raf', 14, -, 3, -, 3]), verbo([binding]), complemento([mutant, blocked, 'progesterone-stimulated', maturation, and, the, activation, of, endogenous, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, and, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase])]). relacion([sujeto(['Similarly,', the, 'full-length', 'B-Raf', 14, -, 3, -, 3]), verbo([binding]), complemento([mutant, inhibited, nerve, growth, 'factor-stimulated', 'PC12', cell, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', conclude, that, 14, -, 3, -, 3, interaction, with, the, catalytic, domain, is, not]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, kinase, activity, per, se, but, is, essential, to, couple, 'B-Raf', catalytic, activity, to, downstream, effector, activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Persistent', hepatitis, 'C', virus, '(', 'HCV)', infection, is, a, major]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, chronic, liver, dysfunction, in, humans, and, is, epidemiologically, closely, associated, with, the, development, of, human, hepatocellular, carcinoma])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', 'HCV', 'components,', core, protein]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, implicated, in, cell, growth, regulation, both, in, vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', although, mechanisms, explaining, those, effects, are, still, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, have, a, close, relationship, with, the, central, dopaminergic, 'system;', one, such, 'brain-gut', peptide, is, 'nesfatin-1'])]). 'Parkinson\'s', disease, '(', 'PD)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, aim, to, clarify, whether, 'nesfatin-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([similar, effects, on, dopaminergic, might]), verbo([have]), complemento([therapeutic, potential, for, 'PD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nine']), verbo([target]), complemento([compounds, were, selected, by, the, 'National', 'Cancer', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hypophosphatemia']), verbo([causes]), complemento([rickets, by, impairing, hypertrophic, chondrocyte, apoptosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Phosphate', induction, of, decreasing, 'VEGF', protein, stability])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', determine, whether, 'Raf', isoforms, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'phosphate-induced', hypertrophic, chondrocyte, 'essential,', but, partially, redundant, roles, in, growth, plate, maturation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', small, 'G', 'proteins,', 'Ras', and, 'Rap1']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, proposed, to, mediate, this, activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', 'HEK293', cells, as, a, model, 'system,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, shown, that, both, 'Ras', and, 'Rap1', are, required, for, cAMP, signaling, to, 'ERKs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, this, is, due, to, sustained]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'B-Raf', to, 'Rap1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['During', this, 'process,', phosphorylation, of, 'c-Raf,', 'MEK1/2,', 'ERK1/2,', and, p90RSK, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'C1ql1/Ctrp14', and, verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'C-Raf', and, induced, a, 'C-Raf', conformational, change, that, enhanced, 'sorafenib-binding', affinity])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, presence, of, 'pDAPK(S308),', this, 'drug-target', interaction, compromised, the, mitochondrial]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([effect, of, the, 'N-terminal', domain, of, 'C-Raf,', which, induced, 'two-hit', damages, to, cancer, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['First,', combination, therapy, facilitated, 'pC-Raf(S338)', and, 'pDAPK(S308)', translocation, from, mitochondria, to, 'cytoplasm,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, mitochondrial, dysfunction, and, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', generation])]). relacion([sujeto(['PP2A', then, dissociated, from, the, 'C-Raf-DAPK', complex, and]), verbo([induced]), complemento([profound, cancer, cell, death])]). relacion([sujeto(['Besides']), verbo([mediating]), complemento([the, anticancer, 'effect,', 'pDAPK(S308)', may, serve, as, a, predictive, biomarker, for, 'Raf', inhibitors, combination, 'therapy,', suggesting, an, ideal, preclinical, model, that, is, worthy, of, clinical, translation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Treatments', for, recurrent, or, metastatic, head, and, neck, squamous, cell, carcinoma, '(', 'HNSCC)']), verbo([have]), complemento([limited, efficacy])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', potential, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, 'HNSCC', is, the, 'RAS/RAF/MEK/ERK', 'cascade,', which, is, one, of, the, major, signaling, pathways, for, 'HNSCC', cell, survival])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'HNSCC,', 'RAS', can, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([either, by, 'HRAS', mutation, or, by, upstream, signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'ABL', inhibitor, nilotinib]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, weak, 'RAF', inhibitor, that, induces, 'RAF', dimerization, and, subsequent, activation, of, 'MEK/ERK', in, other, cancer, cell, lines, with, activated, 'RAS,', leading, to, an, unexpected, dependence, on, 'MEK/ERK', for, cell, survival])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nilotinib']), verbo([induced]), complemento([significant, 'BRAF-CRAF', heterodimerization, and, 'ERK', activation, irrespective, of, 'RAS', mutation, status])]). relacion([sujeto(['MEK162', alone]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['G1', arrest, that, was, minimally, enhanced, by, nilotinib])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, mouse, 'model,', treatment, with, 'MEK162', alone, or, combined, with, nilotinib]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, tumor, growth, inhibition])]). 'MEK', dependence, for, cell, survival, in, all, 'HNSCC', cell, lines])]). relacion([sujeto(['MEK', inhibition, alone]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, decreased, proliferation, both, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', nilotinib]), verbo([has]), complemento([some, synergistic, effects, with, 'MEK162,', other, agents, may, be, more, effective, against, 'HNSCC', when, combined, with, 'MEK162'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', 'Cluster', of, 'Differentiation', 166, '(', 'CD166)', and, 'Melanoma', 'Cell', 'Adhesion', 'Molecule', '(', 'MCAM)', play, critical, roles, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([transformative, phenotype, of, 'Hepatocellular', 'Carcinoma', '(', 'HCC)', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'CD166', has, a, positive, impact, on, the, expression, of, 'MCAM,', while, 'MCAM', has, no, feedback, on, 'CD166'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Depletion', of, 'CD166-induced', 'anti-carcinogenic', 'CD166']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['MCAM', through, a, signaling, flow, from, activation, of, 'PI3K/AKT', and, 'c-Raf/MEK/ERK', signaling, to, the, inhibition, of, potential, 'MCAM', relacion([sujeto(['Tumors', are, often, greatly, dependent, on, signaling, cascades]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([cell, growth, or, survival, and, may, become, hypersensitive, to, inactivation, verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'MAPK', cascade])]). relacion([sujeto(['Melatonin,', a, neurohormone, secreted, mainly, by, the, pineal, 'gland,']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, variety, of, investigated, in, vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', if, the, oxidative, 'stress-mediated', activation, of, the, 'ERK1/2', 'pathway,', and, its, downstream]), verbo([target]), complemento(['STAT3,', could, be, one, mechanism, involved, in, the, potential, oncogenic, potential, of, excess, 'Ald', exposure])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ald']), verbo([caused]), complemento(['cRaf,', 'MEK1/2', and, 'ERK1/2', phosphorylation, both, in, 'LLC-PK1', cells, and, in, rat, kidneys])]). relacion([sujeto(['ERK1/2', activation]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, an, increased, phosphorylation, of, 'MSK1,', 'p90RSK,', and, 'STAT3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', involvement, of, 'ERK1/2', in, the, activation, of, 'STAT3', was, evidenced, by, the, capacity, of, the, 'MEK', inhibitor, 'U0126', to]), verbo([prevent]), complemento(['Ald-mediated', 'ERK1/2', and, 'STAT3', phosphorylation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', in, vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', the, activation, of, 'ERK1/2', and, 'STAT3', by, 'Ald', was, dependent, on, the, mineralocorticoid, receptor, and, was]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, an, increase, in, cellular, oxidants])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ald-mediated', oxidant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([was, in, part, due, to, the, activation, of, the, enzymes, 'NADPH', oxidase, and, 'NO', synthase])]). relacion([sujeto(['Proliferation', was, significantly]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([and, apoptosis, decreased, in, 'Ald-treated', rat, kidneys, 'and/or', 'LLC-PK1', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Results', support, the, concept, that, the, 'oxidant-mediated', 'long-term', activation, of, 'ERK1/2/STAT3', by, persistently, high, 'Ald', levels, could]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([proliferative, and, prosurvival, events])]). relacion([sujeto(['RAS', effectors, specifically]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, 'GTP-bound', form, of, 'RAS', in, response, to, extracellular, signals, and, link, them, to, downstream, signaling, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Equilibrium', dissociation, constants, were, determined, for, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'HRAS,', 'KRAS,', 'NRAS,', 'RRAS1', and, 'RRAS2', to, both, the, 'RAS', binding, '(', 'RB)', domain, of, 'CRAF', and, 'PI3Kα,', and, the, 'RAS', association, '(', 'RA)', domain, of, 'RASSF5,', 'RALGDS', and, 'PLCε,', 'respectively,', using, fluorescence, polarization])]). of, high, sequence, variability, not, only, 'between,', but, also, 'within,', 'RB/RA', 'domain-containing', effectors, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, trichostatin, 'A,', 'bortezomib,', 'etoposide,', cytarabine, and, 'BH3', mimetics])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further', analysis, traces, the, 'pro-apoptotic', effects, of, 'HDAC', inhibitors, to]), verbo([increased]), complemento([acetylation, of, the, chaperone, heat, shock, protein, 90, '(', 'HSP90),', causing, release, and, degradation, of, the, 'HSP90', client, proteins, 'RASGRP1', and, 'CRAF,', which, in, relacion([sujeto(['A', majority, of, patients, with, 'BRAFV600E', melanomas]), verbo([respond]), complemento([well, to, inhibitors, such, as, 'vemurafenib,', but, all, ultimately, relapse])]). relacion([sujeto(['Malignant', tumors, frequently, exhibited, poor, expression, of, 'miR-32,', whose]), verbo([targets]), complemento([include, 'NRAS,', 'PI3K', and, 'notably,', 'MCL-1'])]). by, participating, in, the, 'MAPK', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unlike', 'BRAF,', 'CRAF']), verbo([requires]), complemento([continuous, chaperoning, by, 'Hsp90', to, retain, 'MAPK', signaling])]). 'interaction,', which, is, independent, of, the, 'ATPase', activity, of, 'Hsp90'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([suggests, that, stringent, assemblage, of, 'Hsp90', complemento([as, a, limiting, factor, to, maintain, the, function, of, a, strong, client, like, 'CRAF', kinase])]). relacion([sujeto(['Erianin', is, a, natural, compound]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 'Dendrobium', chrysotoxum, 'Lindl'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Erianin']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['HG-induced', vascular, endothelial, growth, factor, '(', 'VEGF)', activation, cycles])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', the, mechanistic, models]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([ways, to, overcome, resistance, to, kinase, inhibitors])]). apoptosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results, of, the, present, study, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, novel, basis, for, the, therapy, of, vascular, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', investigated, the, effect, of, the, 'BRAF', inhibitor, vemurafenib, on, normal, immortalized, human, 'HaCaT', keratinocytes, to, explore, the, mechanism, of, hyperproliferative, cutaneous, results, revealed, that, 2, '\240\μmol/L', vemurafenib, treatment]), verbo([increased]), complemento([matrix, metalloproteinase, '(', 'MMP)-2', and, 'MMP-9', expressions, and, activities, in, 'HaCaT', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, offer, additional, insight, into, the, complex, mechanism, of, paradoxical, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, signaling]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, hyperproliferative, cutaneous, neoplasias, that, arise, after, 'BRAF', inhibition, and, suggest, a, possible, role, for, 'MMP', in, tumor, progression, and, invasion])]). relacion([sujeto(['To']), verbo([gain]), complemento([insight, into, 'BCR-ABL-independent', 'IM', resistance, 'mechanisms,', we, performed, a, 'large-scale', 'RNA', interference, screen, and, identified, 'IM-sensitizing', genes, '(', 'IMSGs)', whose, knockdown, renders, 'BCR-ABL(+)', cells, 'IM-resistant'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, microtracer, approach]), verbo([provided]), complemento([an, innovative, and, efficient, method, for, assessing, the, absolute, bioavailability, of, dabrafenib, in, patients, with, advanced, cancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rocaglamides', are, potent, natural, anticancer, products, that]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([proliferation, of, various, cancer, cells, at, nanomolar, concentrations])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, shown, that, these, compounds, prevent, tumor, growth, and, sensitize, resistant, cancer, cells, to, apoptosis, by, blocking, the, 'MEK-ERK-eIF4', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', using, an, affinity, chromatography, approach, we, discovered, that, prohibitin, '(', 'PHB)', 1, and, 2, are, the, direct]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, rocaglamides])]). relacion([sujeto(['Binding', of, rocaglamides, to, 'PHB']), verbo([prevents]), complemento([interaction, between, 'PHB', and, 'CRaf', 'and,', 'thereby,', inhibits, 'CRaf', activation, and, subsequently, 'CRaf-MEK-ERK', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', our]), verbo([finding]), complemento([suggests, that, rocaglamides, are, a, new, type, of, anticancer, agent, and, that, they, may, serve, as, a, 'small-molecular', tool, for, studying, 'PHB-mediated', cellular, processes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interaction', with, prohibitin, '(', 'PHB)', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, full, activation, of, 'CRAF', 'kinase,', the, central, member, of, the, highly, conserved, 'RAS-CRAF-MAPK', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto([show, that, the, natural, 'anti-tumor', compounds, rocaglamides]), verbo([target]), complemento([the, 'CRAF-PHB', interaction, to, disrupt, the, 'MAPK', pathway, leading, to, proliferation, block, in, human, leukemic, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Germline', '(', 'L597V)BRAF', mutations, are, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, several, autosomal, dominant, developmental, conditions, known, as, 'RASopathies,', raising, the, important, question, of, how, the, same, mutation, can, contribute, to, both, pathologies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', a, conditional, 'knock-in', mouse, 'model,', we, show, that, endogenous, expression, of, '(', 'L597V)Braf']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, approximately, twofold, elevated, 'Braf', kinase, activity, and, weak, activation, of, the, 'Mek/Erk', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, induction, of, 'RASopathy', hallmarks, including, cardiac, abnormalities, and, facial, dysmorphia, but, is, not, sufficient, for, tumor, formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', combined, '(', 'L597V)Braf', with, '(', 'G12D)Kras', and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, '(', 'L597V)Braf', modified, '(', 'G12D)Kras', oncogenesis, such, that, fibroblast, transformation, and, lung, tumor, development, were, more, reminiscent, of, that, driven, by, the, 'high-activity', '(', 'V600E)Braf', mutant])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mek/Erk', activation, levels, were, comparable, with, those, driven, by, '(', 'V600E)Braf', in, the, 'double-mutant', 'cells,', and, the, gene, expression, signature, was, more, similar, to, that]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, '(', 'V600E)Braf', than, '(', 'G12D)Kras'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', unlike, '(', 'V600E)Braf,', 'Mek/Erk', pathway, activation, was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, both, 'Craf', and, 'Braf,', and, 'ATP-competitive', 'RAF', inhibitors, induced, paradoxical, 'Mek/Erk', pathway, activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'FAM83B', coprecipitated, with, a, downstream, effector, of, 'RAS,', 'CRAF'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Binding', of, 'FAM83B', with, 'CRAF', disrupted, 'CRAF/14-3-3', interactions, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['CRAF', membrane, 'localization,', resulting, in, elevated, 'MAPK', and, mammalian, target, of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ablation', of, 'FAM83B']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, proliferation, and, malignant, phenotype, of, 'tumor-derived', cells, or, 'RAS-transformed', 'HMECs,', implicating, 'FAM83B', as, a, key, intermediary, in, 'EGFR/RAS/MAPK', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['Analysis', of, human, tumor, specimens, revealed, that, 'FAM83B', expression, was, significantly, elevated, in, cancer, and, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, specific, cancer, 'subtypes,', increased, tumor, 'grade,', and, decreased, overall, survival])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cumulatively,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'FAM83B', is, an, oncogene, and, potentially, represents, a, new, target, for, therapeutic, intervention])]). relacion([sujeto(['BRAF', and, 'RAS', are, often, mutated, in, cutaneous, melanoma, and, both, mutations]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([the, 'MAPK', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['However', the, biological, consequences, of, 'BRAF', and, 'NRAS', mutations, are, different, because, when, 'RAS', is, mutated, in, 'melanoma,', cells, use, 'CRAF', rather, than, 'BRAF', to]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['MEK/ERK'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mechanism, of, this, 'BRAF', to, 'CRAF', isoform, switching, in, response, to, oncogenic, 'RAS']), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, described])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activation', of, the, 'MAPK', 'pathway,', which, results, from, a, mutation, of, 'NRAS,']), verbo([induces]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, 'BRAF', on, serine, 151, by, 'ERK', which, prevents, its, binding, to, 'NRAS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', circumvent, this, negative, feedback, inhibition, of, 'BRAF,', melanoma, cells, containing, a, mutation, of, 'RAS', use, 'CRAF', to]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['MEK/ERK'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', because, the, cAMP, pathway, in, melanocytes, constitutively]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['CRAF,', 'RAF', isoform, switching, in, melanoma, is, accompanied, by, an, inhibition, of, the, cAMP, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', inhibition, is, due, to, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, phosphodiesterase, 'activity,', which, degrades, cAMP, thereby, preventing, inhibition, of, 'CRAF', by, 'PKA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', numerous, growth, factors]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'RAS-ERK', 'pathway,', they, can, have, different, effects, on, the, amplitude, and, duration, of, the, 'ERK', signal, 'and,', 'therefore,', on, the, biological, consequences])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', 'instance,', nerve, growth, 'factor,', which, elicits, a, larger, and, more, sustained]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'ERK', phosphorylation, in, 'PC12', cells, than, does, epidermal, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF),', stimulates, 'PC12', cell, 'differentiation,', whereas, 'EGF', stimulates, 'PC12', cell, proliferation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, this, restriction, in, 'ERK1/2', phosphorylation, depended, on, methylation, of, 'RAF', proteins, by, protein, arginine, methyltransferase, 5, '(', 'PRMT5)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['PRMT5-dependent', methylation]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, degradation, of, activated, 'CRAF', and, 'BRAF,', thereby, reducing, their, catalytic, activity])]). intervention])]). relacion([sujeto(['Alzheimer\'s', disease, '(', 'AD)', is, characterized, by, memory]), verbo([loss]), complemento([and, the, upregulation, of, 'pro-neuroinflammatory', factors, relacion([sujeto(['Epidemiological', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'epigallocatechin-3-gallate', '(', 'EGCG)', possesses, chemopreventive, properties, against, cancer])]). 'CLL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, 'SPRY2', expression, is, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, 'CLL', 'cells,', particularly, from, 'poor-prognosis', patients, compared, arylamide, or, arylurea, terminal, moieties]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, designed, and, synthesized])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', above, mentioned, compounds]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, stronger, antiproliferative, activities, in, terms, of, potency, and, efficacy, upon, comparing, their, results, with, 'Sorafenib', as, a, reference, compound])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rasopathies', are, a, group, of, rare, disorders, characterized, by, neurocardiofaciocutaneous, 'involvement,', and]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, several, genes, of, the, 'RAS/MAPK', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Studies', using, different, 'techniques,', such, as, 'dual-energy', 'X-ray', absorptiometry, or, imaging, 'studies,', which, give, a, more, verbo([provide]), complemento([an, overview, of, clinical, aspects, of, this, disorder, and, closely, related, 'conditions,', the, molecular, mechanisms, underlying, 'pathogenesis,', and, major, 'genotype-phenotype', correlations])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'β-lap', provoked, the, cleavage, of, heat, shock, protein, 90, '(', 'Hsp90)', in, quinone, 'oxidoreductase-1', '(', 'NQO1)-expressing', lung, and, prostate, cancer, cells, as, well, as, in, primary, human, umbilical, vein, endothelial, cells, '(', 'HUVECs)'])]). complemento([the, growth, and, angiogenesis, of, human, lung, cancer, xenografts, in, nude, mice, and, decreased, the, levels, of, 'receptor-interacting', 'protein,', 'AKT,', 'CDK4,', and, 'CD31', in, the, solid, tumors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unlike', other, 'NQO1-dependent', cytotoxic, 'quinones,', such, as, 'streptonigrin,', 'menadione,', 'mitomycin,', and, 17, -, 'allylamino-17-demethoxygeldanamycin,', 'β-lap', was, the, only, agent, that, could]), verbo([cause]), complemento(['Hsp90', cleavage])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, crucial, mechanism, underlying, the, antitumor, efficacy, of, 'β-lap'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Lapatinib,', a, dual, epidermal, growth, factor, receptor, '(', 'EGFR)', and, 'HER2', tyrosine, kinase, inhibitor, '(', 'TKI),']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, approved, for, 'HER2-positive', breast, cancer, patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nevertheless,', its, inhibitory, effect, on, 'EGFR', did, not, deliver, clinical, benefits, for, 'triple-negative', breast, cancer, '(', 'TNBC)', patients, even, 'EGFR', overexpression, was, frequently]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, this, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', lapatinib, was, unexpectedly]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, enhance, metastasis, of, 'TNBC', 'cells,', but, the, underlying, mechanisms, are, not, fully, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mechanistically,', the, signaling, axis, of, 'Raf-1/mitogen-activated', protein, kinases, '(', 'MAPKs),', 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', 'patients;', cells, which, are, not, per, se, addicted, to, high, activity, oncogene, signals, that, are, targets, of, 'sorafenib/regorafenib'])]). relacion([sujeto(['PAH']), verbo([associated]), 'these,', clinical, 'suspicion,', early, 'diagnosis,', early, 'The', 'µ-opioid', receptor, '(', 'OPRM1)', signals, as, a, classic, 'G', 'protein-coupled', receptor, by]), verbo([activating]), complemento([heterotrimeric, 'Gi/Go', proteins, resulting, in, adenylyl, cyclase, '(', 'AC)', inhibition])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', after, receptor, 'desensitization,', the, intracellular, cAMP, level, remains]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'OPRM1,', as, demonstrated, by, the, intracellular, cAMP, level, increase, or, 'AC', superactivation, upon, removal, of, an, agonist, or, pathway, resulting, from, 'OPRM1', being, converted, to, a, receptor, tyrosine, kinase, '(', 'RTK)-like', entity])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', noncanonical, 'OPRM1', signaling, is, initiated, by, the, receptor]), verbo([recruiting]), complemento([and, activating, 'Src', kinase, within, the, receptor, 'complex,', leading, to, phosphorylation, of, the, 'OPRM1', 'Tyr(336)', residue])]). relacion([sujeto(['Phospho-Tyr(336)', serves, as, the, docking, site, for, growth, factor, 'receptor-bound', 'protein/son', of, 'sevenless,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, recruitment, and, activation, of, the, 'Ras/Raf-1', and, subsequent, phosphorylation, and, activation, of, 'AC5/6', by, 'Raf-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Src', together, with, 'Ras']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['Raf1', which, was, established, by, the, inability, of, the, 'Raf1-Tyr(340/341)', mutant, to, activate, 'AC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hence,', the, phosphorylation, of, 'OPRM1', at, 'Tyr(336)', by, 'Src', serves, as, the]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([for, the, conversion, of, a, classic, 'Gi/Go-coupled', receptor, into, an, 'RTK-like', 'entity,', resulting, in, a, noncanonical, pathway, even, after, the, original, 'Gi/Go', signals, are, blunted])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', analysis, of, literature, source, allowed, to, authors, affirms, that, signaling, system, of, postconditioning, can]), verbo([involve]), complemento(['kinases:', 'PKC,', 'PI3K,', 'Akt,', 'MEKl/2,', 'ERK1/2,', 'MTOR,', 'p70s6K,', 'GSK3b,', 'PKG', and, also, 'eNOS,', 'NO,', 'GC,', kinase, activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', knowledge, of, 'Ras', and, 'Raf-1', role, in, postconditioning]), verbo([has]), complemento([hypothetical, character])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', and, transformation])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'BRAF', regulation, remain, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'work,', not]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, mutant, 'BRAF', or, induce, ubiquitination, thereof])]). relacion([sujeto(['Raf', 'Kinase', 'Inhibitory', 'Protein', or, 'RKIP', was, initially, identified, as, a, 'Raf-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, using, the, yeast, 2, -, hybrid, screen])]). relacion([sujeto(['RKIP']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, activation, phosphorylation, of, of, mammalian, cells, into, mitosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Protein', kinase, 'D', '(', 'PKD)', is, known, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'Golgi-to-cell', surface, transport, by, controlling, the, biogenesis, of, specific, transport, carriers])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, depletion, of, 'PKD1', and, 'PKD2', proteins, from, 'HeLa', cells, by, small, verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'Ras', and, serve, as, mediators, of, mitogenic, signals])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', studies, emphasized, the, importance, of, 'Raf-1', and, 'b-Raf', in]), verbo([preventing]), complemento([apoptosis, in, addition, to, their, roles, in, cell, growth])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, examined, whether, inhibition, of, the, 'Raf-1', complemento([the, 'MAPK', pathway, at, two, distinct, 'points,', 'Raf', kinase, and, 'MEK,', has, greater, efficacy, in, increasing, cancer, cell, death, and, is, likely, to, improve, therapeutic, outcomes, for, patients])]).
